name: Mandy
title: UPDATED REVIEW - 5 months in
content: I have been taking these gummies (along with their women‚Äôs multi vitamin) religiously for 3.5 weeks now. There isn‚Äôt a drastic difference yet, but I am seeing improvements and plan to wait a full 3 months for best results like others have mentioned.. For my background, I am a healthy 30 year old woman. No history of medical issues (aside from occasional low iron which I take vitamins for as well). 7 months ago I had COVID for about 8 days. I lost my taste and smell like most other people but that was about it. Fast forward about 3 months later, I started to notice that I was losing more hair every time I would shower (which is daily for my oily hair). It wasn‚Äôt large clumps at a time but it was definitely more than the usual 5-10 strands that I was used to. I thought at first that this was stress-related since I‚Äôve had a lot going on lately but then I started to notice that my hair texture had drastically changed to being thin and lifeless and the crown of my head and hair-part were really thin. I could see my scalp when I have never been able to see that before which started to scare me. By month 6 I was looking up every option to help.. At the beginning of May I started using the following:. - I take 2 of these vitamins once a day at night (both the hair vitamins and womens multi vitamin). - I kept up with my routine of taking iron pills because I‚Äôm anemic (this can also affect hair growth so I made sure to keep up with this - but DO NOT take iron supplements if you don‚Äôt need it as this can cause health problems for someone that doesn‚Äôt need iron supplements). -I started using Nioxin hair treatments (2% minoxidil topical treatments twice per day, massaged into my scalp in the morning and at night). - I started using Nioxin shampoo and conditioner every day. - and I started to use Redken extreme length sealer cream as a styling leave in conditioner before blow drying my hair. (All products mentioned are pictured with this review). After 3.5 weeks of this strict routine, I am starting to notice a difference and hope for continued growth. I will say, I am unsure which product is doing the trick for me but I am keeping up with the routine regardless because I am desperate for my old hair back.. Note: it‚Äôs worth mentioning that I‚Äôve been told that once you start a topical solution like Nioxin, you‚Äôll have to keep up with it otherwise your hair will start to fall out again like it did originally. It shouldn‚Äôt cause additional fallout, but it will essentially go back to where you started from what I‚Äôve heard. I‚Äôm not sure if this is a marketing scheme or if it‚Äôs true, so I‚Äôm just incorporating it into my routine from here on out- it‚Äôs honestly not that inconvenient once you‚Äôre used to it. Also if using any Minoxidil topical solution, be careful when applying the solution that you don‚Äôt get it on your face-unless you want facial hair.. I hope to post an update in 2 or 3 months. Thanks for reading my long review (sorry!) and good luck to anyone else going through this.. ***5-MONTH UPDATE*** I have been eating these gummies every night for 5 months now. I am happy to say that I have seen significant hair growth and my hair is much thicker again (no more bald spots on top of my head either). I stopped using the Nioxin after about 2 months of my routine because my hairline improved quickly and I wanted to see if I could take away that treatment and keep my results. Now, I am only taking the vitamins and my hair has grown about 6 inches in 5 months! My hair usually grows slow so this was a big deal for me. I also noticed that my nails are so much stronger than before, and my eyelashes seem to be thicker as well (I didn‚Äôt start to notice these benefits until about month 3 or 4 though). I haven‚Äôt had any skin issues like some people have posted, but everyone is different. I hope to continue these vitamins for the next 6‚Äì7 months and then I plan to provide a 1-year updated review.

name: Texas Jen
title: This helped me slow down hair loss, but when I stopped talking it the hair loss returned.
content: They are a little expensive, but they seem to work. I'm on my 3rd bottle. I took first bottle thinking I'll try it... who knows. I didn't really see a difference at first.. I sit in my chair and have a habit of running my fingers through my hair getting rid of tangles when I am on the phone. Usually every time I end up having about 10-15 stands come out every time I comb through my hair with my hands to the point I was getting very concerned! Then shower after and as I'm shampooing and conditioning more would come out in my hands. Plus, I'd need to clear the drain several times to get water to drain and even after shower and after water had all drained go back and clear the rest of the hair out of drain.. I've always had very thick hair. I keep it below shoulders but above or at bra strap range.. So back to the first bottle. I had been taking them every day, and I was nearing 3 week and trying to decide if I should order another bottle and had decided not to waste the money. A few days later, I was chatting on the phone with my mom and running my fingers through my hair... like I do, and noticed only 2-3 strands of hair in my fingers each time. I was shocked. I kept running my hands through my hair and sometimes only 1 strand or none. I took a shower, least amount of hair in my drain than I've seen in a very long time!. So I ordered my second btl.. I wasn't as diligent about taking it daily and with this stay at home order where I live, different from shelter in place orders other states have, I got a little down and at a time where I should be upping all my supplement intake to keep my immune system healthy, I got down and wasn't taking much of anything.. I started noticing handfuls of hair coming out each time again. So I started back on my gummies about 2 week's ago and put in my order for my next bottle and received it yesterday.. So I haven't noticed thicker hair yet, but my hair didn't get down to half its thickness in just a month. It took a year and a half to really get thin.. I will say that it's already started slowing down the hairs I lose every time I run my fingers through it.. I did notice that my scalp is less visible when I'm styling it ( that I noticed after the first month I started taking them).. Biotin and folic acid are very important to hair and growth. But what is also important to know is B vitamins work together. So this product contains 5B vitamins (B6,B9,B12,B7, and B5).. The only thing I wish they would remove is the blue coloring. I usually attempt to stay away from food colorings. I mean who cares what color it is as long as it works. Plus I prefer not to have extra toxic ingredients, and I would love if they added all the B vitamins.. I'm going to finish my second bottle and start my third with no long gaps this time to see how things go, but in the interim I'm also going to look for a good liquid B complex as well.. Just a side note if you didn't already glean this little tidbit of knowledge from my long winded review, when you stop taking these you will go back to losing your hair.. It's not a one time quick fix! However, that is with everything in life. You stop eating junk food for a month, you feel great and lose weight and have more energy and are healthier for those changes and choices made. You go back to eating junk and you go back to where you were before.. Any healthy changes you choose to make in your life you will need to continue in order to keep seeing results.. I hope this helps anyone that has a bit of time on their hands to read it. üòÅ. Clearly I had a bit of extra time on my hands to write it considering most of us are staying at home until we can return to work.

This is something I never was looking to ‚Äúsacrifice‚Äù with other vitamins because they didn‚Äôt show much results and I would break out quite a bit, even on my back (I NEVER break out there). name: Darkskinnedmakeupdaily
title: NOT A HYPE IT DEFINITELY WORKS!!
content: I first saw these gummies all over my social media feed, I was interested but thought it was a overhyped product, especially when I saw the Kardashians advertising it. I‚Äôm an African American female who joined the natural hair community over 2 years ago. My hair texture is kinky coily 4C and wouldn‚Äôt grow past a certain length even with protective styles and natural oils. January 2018, I purchased these vitamins after doing my research and reading the reviews on here. I also changed my diet, eating more leafy greens and drinking more water and focused on skincare to avoid breaking out. I was shocked when I started seeing results after two weeks, not only was my hair growing longer, the sparse areas in my edges grew back and I had new hair growing around my hair line pushing it forward. My nails also grew and hairs on the other parts of my body both wanted and unwanted lol. My sister is my hair stylist and she too noticed my hair growth but convinced me it was my new diet and healthy lifestyle rather than the gummies, so I stopped taking them after February. Unfortunately, my hair stopped growing, my edges started getting sparse and my nails were not as strong. After 3 months with no progress, I repurchased the Sugar Bear Hair Gummies in June. I‚Äôm writing this review a month later and MY HAIR IS GROWING AGAIN!! This time I did have some break outs pop up during the first week but they went away and I haven‚Äôt had anymore show up. The only con I have is the price, almost $40 a month is adds up but I recommend you try it out. Sorry for the long review.

name: Beth
title: So far...
content: I will have to come back in 3 months to update my review. For now I give it 5 stars based on taste, ease of taking and ingredients. I won‚Äôt review based on results until I‚Äôve tried it at least 90 days. No one can really give an accurate review of a product like this for a few months. Taste: they are yummy. Can‚Äôt complain about that at all. Best part about the flavor is once you‚Äôre finished chewing & swallowing, the flavor pretty much goes away. It‚Äôs not a lingering flavor.. Ease of taking: yes, they are easy to chew. Very soft. Not rubbery like a gummy bear. However, they do tend to stick to your teeth. It‚Äôs not that bad. They dissolve fairly quickly so it‚Äôs very little that sticks.. Ingredients: It‚Äôs full of all the vitamins needed for healthy hair, skin, nails. Nothing to complain about there. For those that do complain about a couple of the extra ingredients like sugar & coloring, please stop. It‚Äôs not enough to make a difference. The gummies are small, and you only chew two daily. FYI.. #1 do NOT contain enough sugar to cause acne. Think about the other things you consume that contain before you blame the vitamins. #2 Please do a little research on the difference between micrograms (mcg) and grams (g). The Inositol is dosed in mcg on this label. It‚Äôs not even close to enough daily to cause a real problem. I think some people could have sensitivities to things, but I also believe the pics shown of people with massive acne breakouts are from people with acne prone skin anyway. I do not have acne on my face. I will be able to give an honest review of the product, if that should change. I doubt it will. Like I said the ‚Äúother‚Äù ingredients like sugar & inositol are not enough to CAUSE severe acne breakouts.. I will be back to update in May!. P.S. I had already been doing other things for my hair prior to starting the gummies. I wash my hair in a quality moroccan oil shampoo & conditioner and I use an argan oil heat protectant spray on my hair before using ANY heating tool whether it‚Äôs a hair dryer, straightener or curler. I threw away my brushes and ONLY use a comb. I don‚Äôt put my hair up wet. I don‚Äôt box color my hair anymore. In fact, I don‚Äôt dye my hair at all. I get it cut every 8 weeks. Once a week I use an argan oil mask. Once a month I use a vinegar rinse (Just Natural). Yep, I spend a lot of money, but the products last forever. My hair is healthier than it‚Äôs ever been. The gunmies were the final step. Oh, and I drink a ton of water. I do that anyway because I workout daily. I eat no sugar, no fried foods, no processed foods. You HAVE to take care of the inside as well as the outside of your body.

name: sanaz_
title: REVERSED years of stress-related hair thinning!!!!! Ladies, I am not making this up!!!!!!!!
content: First off, I never review products, and I would have never imagined myself to have such rave reviews for adult gummy vitamins. But I figured that as a 22-year old woman who has dealt with hair loss and thinning at the part for a majority of her teenage and young adult life, my experience with this product may be worth sharing. After a parent was diagnosed with a chronic illness when I was a teenager, stress and hair loss (and stress because of hair loss, etc.) had become a normal part of my life. Countless doctor appointments, hair specialist visits and blood tests had ruled out the possibilities of allergic reactions, genetic disorders, and hormonal imbalances. It wasn't until my general practitioner finally mentioned that the causes were likely stress and nutrition-related that I started doing research into vitamins to treat my deficiencies, and boy, am I glad I did. Soon after, I came across SugarBearHair--which I recognized from the plethora of promotions made by the Kardashian clan and other celebrities--and quite frankly, I was skeptical about its legitimacy. But by this point, I was at my wits end after years of treatments and finding no real results, so I figured I would give this a try for at least one month.... I am not exaggerating when I say that the results have been FANTASTIC. In the last month, I have received comments from my hairstylist, hair loss specialist and family about my hair regrowth. My hair looks fuller now than it has in years, with thick hair regrowth on the back of my head. I can also see my thinning part beginning to slowly fill out. To say that I am RELIEVED AND ASTONISHED would be an UNDERSTATEMENT. It should also be noted that I am using this product in combination with other vitamins, Spironolactone and birth control pills targeted at preventing hair loss, as well as better managing my stress, sleep, exercise and diet. However, it is also worth mentioning that it wasn't until a few weeks AFTER I started taking SugarBear that I starting seeing real results. I just started bottle two, and I don't intend to stop. Fingers crossed the results will keep coming. To all the young ladies out there experiencing hair thinning: PLEASE PLEASE 1) manage your stress, diet, sleep, and overall health; and 2) TAKE YOUR GUMMIES!

title: Hair loss after baby? Try these- it worked for me
content: I have never written a review for any of the hundreds of times I‚Äôve bought through amazon prime over the last three years but I absolutely had to give this product some props. I‚Äôve had naturally curly, very thick hair, and super strong, fast-growing nails my entire life, always have gotten compliments on my hair and my nails and as silly as it sounds, wished my hair was thinner because it was SO much to deal with. As I‚Äôve gotten older (I‚Äôm 30 at the time of writing this) my hair has thinned out. After my second child was born almost seven months ago.. My hormones took over and my hairline was visually receding like a grown man‚Äôs. My fingernails were never affected and have remained strong and beautiful, but my face and scalp dried out extremely bad and my hair was just falling out excessively. I couldn‚Äôt put my hair up anymore and did everything I could to hide my bald spots. I cried everyday. My doctor told me eventually my hair should start growing back but it takes time. I‚Äôve had friends who have had this problem and their hair NEVER grew back so I was mortified remembering how little hair my grandma had when she died at age 65. I was hesitant on trying these because I‚Äôve heard gummy vitamins don‚Äôt absorb as well but I was willing to try anything to get my hair back. It‚Äôs a 6 week difference between these pics. My nails never took a hit but they‚Äôre growing even faster than normal and even my skin dryness has improved a little. My main concern was my hair. My hair has not grown this fast since I was a kid and it no longer looks like I‚Äôm balding. The proof is in the pics and I‚Äôve had multiple friends order now just from seeing my results.

name: COSMO
title: THESE HAVE SAVED MY HAIR'S LIFE!
content: I've been using this product for the last 3+ months since late September. After an incident with swimming in my pool with dyed hair, half my hair was falling out! Hair dye and swimming DO NOT MIX. My hair used to be down to my stomach, after the chemical mishap, it went up to my shoulders, I cried every night in bed. I was skeptical about buying these, there was almost a point where I thought about shaving my head because I was that desperate to get my length back. These were my last resort and OMG, these were absolutely life savers! I'm not to say these are magical gummies, results take time, patience and consistency. Along with my recovery, I did adapt to a hair care routine and took safety precautions such as washing my hair 1-2x a week, sleeping with a satin bonnet every night, applying detangler/leave in spray conditioner after washing my hair, not wrapping your hair in a towel, not using a hair dryer, applying hair growth biotin to my scalp to boost the results. I take photos of my hair growth every month, within the 1st month, my hair was healthier, softer and stronger, after 3 months, I do see a huge difference in length. I'm glad I purchased these, I was so desperate to regain my length. Along with a hair care routine, these gummies will give you reasonable results. This is not a quick fix, but, trust me, it will be worth it!

name: Amazon Customer
title: Sugar bears cleared my acne prone skin!
content: I never write reviews for anything but the fact this is the one vitamin that I have noticed results from..I just have to let all of you know that rather than help grow my hair (which is actually true).. it has caused my skin to be extremely smooth. I have always been prone to breakouts.. I've been on accutane twice, proactive for years and just recently I started getting facials just for maintenance purposes. I always used to have little pimples on my forehead and then some on my neck and near my temples.. but it just depended on the week..some weeks were way better than others for my skin... people who get regular acne will understand what I mean. After being on accutane.. my skin become gorgeous..both times it lasted for about a year and then I would begin to have break outs again. I would go tanning in tanning beds just to try to dry out the pimples or it would just make my face darker which I felt hid my acne..(it actually just was damaging my skin even more and causing me more oily breakouts)..as much as I knew tanning was awful for me.. it was the one thing that I felt helped( although it really didn't!) I started taking sugar bear hair two months ago.. I can't say my skin was awful before taking them because it wasn't.. it wasnt great either.. but ever since I began taking these delicious gummies.. I swear I rarely get a pimple!!! My forehead I so smooth and clear along with the rest of my face. Bottom line.. these things are delicious.. I would eat a handful if I could. I figured they were just a fluke ad that everyone posts on instagram.. but I'm telling you.. it really works. I have longer hair to start but I have noticed stronger and thinker hair. I mainly take them for my skin now that I have found out how amazing they are. I read reviews of people saying that you shouldn't take them if you have acne prone skin but believe me ..everyone is different.. it might just work for you like it has for me!

Just get acbe treatment in advance.

title: This won't work if your system is too toxic and stressed out change a little gain ALOT
content: I am the last one to give anything a good review for no reason. So believe me when I say with all honesty, I just finished my first bottle (I got the 3 month supply because your system doesnt take some time to adjust and if you want something that works and lasts, you will never get anything that will give you what you want over night.. I have literally tried EVERHTHING. Straight biotin and more.. But for starters, first off my nails have never grown this evenly, quickly or have ever been this strong. Ever. My family are the toughest cridicts and even they noticed (whaaaa) lol. Second, I have daily extream anxiety and stress and to be honest I am not a stranger to depression, so when my hair got as thin as it was I really thought there was something wrong with me... After a slight change in diet (just eating a little better) and taking this, ONE MONTH my hair is 2 inches longer and is looking healthier. It used to take a few months for it to grow an inch and a half.. It got really bad.. So my suggestion to you. If you want this to work, you should also try taking a bit better care of yourself on the insides. Most vitamins and supplements WONT WORK if your body can't process them. Learned this the hard LOOOONG way as well.. I reccomend it, and wish you all the best.

name: Amazon Customer
title: 1) The taste is AWESOME! They are very soft and delicious
content: I have a lot to say about these. I bought them to help my hair grow. I have been taking these vitamins for about 6/7 weeks. Which means I am on my second bottle and I also think I now have a solid review:. PROS:. 1) The taste is AWESOME! They are very soft and delicious, like a fruity gummy snack. Honestly hard to eat just the recommended 2!. 2) My nails have never been stronger. They grow insanely fast and do not break (maybe a tiny tear in a corner but nothing a nail file cant fix) I must also add that I am very rough on my nails. They are also shiny and the tips are very opaque and white (normally the tips of my nails are flimsy and see through). 3) My hair seems to be growing faster. I can usually get away with not coloring my roots for up to 8 weeks but right around 5 weeks it was looking BAD! I would say my normal hair grows just over 1/2 inch per month and now its growing 1/2 inch in about 3 weeks. My opinion is you will see results but nothing like the pictures you see on instagram where you see girls' hair growing 2 inches in a month.. CONS:. 1) Body hair will also grow faster. For some reason I think my armpit hair is growing the fastest lol but my eyebrows have also filled in more than usual (this can be a PRO for some ladies with sparse brows) I did not notice any improvement in eyelashes. 2) The price is a little high but I have never seen such great results for my nails from a vitamin so it might be worth it to some people.. Overall, great product. I think it delivers what it says it will deliver. Personally, I will try it for one more month and see if I get any substantial hair growth and if not I will no longer place future orders.

Now I‚Äôve read about it and I know it‚Äôs normal and that having baby hairs all over is common. However it was still such an extreme and my hair was also very dry and dull compared to what it had been long before I was even pregnant. I‚Äôve only been taking these for a week and maybe I‚Äôm crazy but the difference in my hair is already so much better. It‚Äôs shinier and less hair is falling out. name: Cinlue
title: I'm in Love
content: I bought these because I had a permanent straightening treatment go wrong last January that has resulted in a line of breakage where the product touched my roots. For the past year I've been dealing with EXTREME breakage, to the point that I had to get bangs cut, which ALMOST ended up looking like a mullet. When I intentionally showed people the extent of the breakage, I was met with gasps, wide eyes, and hands over their mouths. I needed something to help grow out my hair as fast as possible.. I've had the vitamins for about three months now. Now, I'm really bad with routines, so for the first two months I took them on and off, probably only about 2-3x a week. However, in the last month I hunkered down and started taking them daily, and I honestly cannot believe the results. I'd say my hair has grown about an inch or more in that month. The new growth is extremely smooth and soft--such a difference compared to the chemically treated hair. And hair isn't just growing faster, but thicker. I didn't think that I had a problem with thickness before, but now my hair looks so thick and dark I can barely see my scalp.. I'm Native American, and long, healthy hair is almost a status symbol, but I've never been able to grow out my hair past my ribs before needing a serious cut. Well, with these babies, I have no doubt I'll be the envy of the family by Christmas. You'd have to pry them from my cold, dead hands to stop me from taking them.. Oh, and they taste pretty bomb too. Which is almost a negative, since you only get to take two of them a day. They're my morning treat!. I bought these on my own, and I'm not getting paid for this review. I'd like to, though. How rad would that be?

name: Ann M.
title: Taste great. Seriously work. No acne!
content: When I got these, I was skeptical. My sister-in-law told me about them. I read all the reviews about getting acne from them and whatnot. I decided to try them anyway. I am so happy I did. My nails were SO thin before these gummies. I could literally tear them. My thumb nails kept splitting down the middle and I would constantly be bending my nails backwards (like, halfway up my nail and causing it to bleed and bruise). I started taking these almost two months ago and my nails have almost completely grown out, so the thin and cracked part is almost gone. My hair has also been improving. I have thin, straight hair. I was losing so much hair that my hubby wouldn't let me shower without a hair catcher because the drain had to be cleaned out every other day or so. It was bad. Since I've been using these, my shedding has decreased dramatically. It's amazing. I genuinely recommend these gummies. I got two pimples when I first started taking them, but I was taking both at once. I started taking one in the morning and one in the evening and I haven't had a problem since. Everyone's skin and bodies are different, so my honest opinion is to try them for at least a month (if not longer) and if you do get acne, just see if your body gets used to it.

Long story short, I had gone to the nail salon and the technician of more than 20 years of service says "did you do something different to your hair b/c it looks LONGER for some reason"...I replied it does...I am scheduled for a relaxer next week (got the relaxer today)...my stylist said you got a lot of NEW GROWTH...I didn't really know if this product would work for black women...it DOES! I thank God I have not had any negative reactions to theses vitamins. I can tell the difference in my hair texture and yes, it has grown in that short time span. name: Nikkie
title: Amazing results but unfortunately expensive
content: I didn't have much of an expectation for these vitamins, but I was excited to try anything after over process if my fine very curly hair.. I was forced to cut a lot as an attempt to remove all the damage but without pretty much chopping it off the cut could only have so much success. I have been taking biotin, which seemed to help but after subsititing with these I have noticed drastic results.. I have been taking these for just under 3 weeks now, and although many people reported it taking months for results, my hair has already grown almost an inch and half! Yup that's right, less than 3 weeks! And I'm not even done with the month yet. I've also noticed my hair is silkier and less frizzy. I don't know how this is possible maybe it effects the oils of the scalp, I don't really care how it happened, but it did.. Now for the basics, I have not had any side effects taking these, other than my hair growth being everywhere lol, I usually do not have to shave my legs or underarms often but now I do. Also the taste isn't bad, sweet but not as amazing as in all the reviews but again not bad. I hate that they are pricy, but they work as well if not better than prenatal vitamins but without side effects. Ideally I'd love to take these regularly forever, but with the cost i don't know that I'd continue under normal circumstances.. Definitely worth a shot if you damaged your hair and need help restoring its glory, or you hair simply will not grow past a certain length.. I purchased this item at full cost, I did NOT receive any discount for my review.

name: Amazon Customer
title: The Only Bears Worth Eating
content: I bought my first bottle of SugarBearHair months ago through their website, and have continued to use this product to supplement my hair since. I do not have long flowing locks, but noticed my hair growing longer and fuller after continued use of this product.. SugarBearHair Vitamins is a SUPPLEMENT; it SUPPLEMENTS your hair. It is not some ancient protected formula, crafted from strains of Repunzel's hair and the blood of Helen of Troy, which will transform you from Larry David to Harry Styles overnight. It, as all SUPPLEMENTS, require strict adherence to the instructions for the allotted time. Oh, and by strict, I mean eat two of those delicious little bears once a day.. As for a testimonial, which obviously may vary from person to person because we are all special little snowflakes and your hair is not exactly like mine, I have seen good results with continued and consistent use of SugarBearHair Vitamin. I naturally have thick, wavy hair. When I supplement it with the Bears, it becomes noticeably even more thick and curly. I started noticing my time between haircuts was shortening, as my hair was lengthening! Also, in regards to some reviews complaining of acne- I am extremely prone to breakouts, and have not suffered any complexion side effects from SugarBearHair. Trust me, if these cubs gave me any indication my face was going rogue and devolving to pizza face, I would immediately stop.. Bottom line, I followed the directions stayed consistent, and the Bears worked and continue to for me. My only complaint is I wish they didn't taste so delicious because I could easily take a 2 month supply to the face. Scoop up some Bears before your hair goes into hibernation.

name: Amazon Customer
title: I hated washing my hair because it would come out in ...
content: These have been a life saver for me. After having an apparent identity crisis and dying my platinum blonde hair black, and then going back to blonde a month later, my hair was completely destroyed, breaking off, and thin. I hated washing my hair because it would come out in clumps. After using these for a month, I've noticed that it has completely stopped breaking off (other than a few strands coming out when I brush it). My hair has grown about an inch and become strong enough that it will not break anymore. Combined with taking extra care of my hair, not so much washing and heat styling, using deep conditioners, it is actually starting to look shiny and healthy again.. My hair has grown incredibly fast, not just on my head. These vitamins make body hair grow faster as well, so I've had to shave just about everyday. The only downside is that they made me break out for a while. I never get acne, and after about a week of using these, I started getting random zits on my face, mostly on my chin. But it seems that my skin is use to them now because I haven't had any issues since.. These vitamins are worth trying and definitely worth the money! They taste great, I find it much easier to eat two of these a day rather than swallowing a bunch of nasty pill supplements. Even my mom, who was skeptical of me ordering $30 hair vitamins on Amazon, tried one and asked me to order her a bottle. I must credit these little bears for saving my hair and hopefully over the next few months, I can grow my healthy blonde hair back out! Will definitely be purchasing more.

name: Sarah K.
title: All You Questions Answered!
content: I've seen A LOT of posts about this on IG, mainly pretty pictures of girls with long hair or pastel masterpieces featuring these cute little guys. I'm a sucker for anything cute and bonus points if it's Tiffany Blue, so when I saw a few of my favorite accounts posting about these I had to at least check them out. It's basically a normal hair/skin/nails(biotin) vitamin, so nothing special in terms of ingredients. So, is this some miracle product that other vitamins can't rival? No. Is this a vitamin that is fun and tastes great? Yes. Is this a vitamin that makes taking them easy on someone who has trouble with pills? Yes. Is the product effective? Yes, if you know what to expect from biotin vitamins like these. Are my nails stronger? Yes. Does my skin look better? Yes. Is my hair growing faster? Time will tell (i"ve only been taking a few weeks and my hair is naturally slow growing as it is, though I have noticed new growth). I guess the last big question is: Is the price worth the effectiveness and novelty of the item? To me, yes. I love these and I will continue to buy them. But, for someone with a smaller budget, you can most likely find a more cost effective equivalent at your local Target - it just won't be as photogenic.

name: Melanie
title: Noticeably healthy, shiny, growing hair in just 2 months
content: So far I have purchased 2 bottles of these vitamins, and within those two short months I have seen SIGNIFICANT change in the appearance of my hair. I was diagnosed with Alopecia Areata in October of 2017. I tried a variety of products for my hair loss, but to no avail. When I first started taking these vitamins in December of 2017 I had several developing bald spots. Some were extremely noticeable and hard to hide. I had heard A LOT of these amazing hair growth vitamins via social media, so I decided to give it a shot. I wasn‚Äôt confident that these would even help my autoimmune condition, but I figured there couldn‚Äôt be any damage in trying. After a couple months, BAM, my bald spots were ENTIRELY covered with new growth and my existing hair had grown quite noticeably considering I had chopped my hair off a few months prior. I‚Äôm not saying by any means that this product can cure Alopecia, or that it will work the same for individuals suffering from the same condition as I. However, I do know that they‚Äôve worked well for me and I will continue to buy them monthly. Not to mention how shiny and healthy my hair appears now!! (I get highlights done frequently) SO happy I gave these a try!!

name: Maria
title: They work!!!
content: These work!!! I have been taking these for three weeks and I will be ordering my next bottle. I started taking these because I was experiencing hair loss and my hairline was looking bald. When I would shower I would lose chunks of hair and for the first time in months I only lost a few strands. Also, when I would brush my hair I would lose so much hair! I have been washing my hair every other day, applying processed castor oil twice a week and using honey shampoo and conditioner. I believe everything has helped, but probably the vitamins have helped me the most. In my picture you‚Äôll see the difference in my hair line and the amount of hair I lost while brushing. The pictures are 3 weeks apart. If you are thinking about buying them, give them a try!

name: Kristen
title: My hair is growing much faster, these are great

Well I have used 2 1/2 bottles now, which is about 10 weeks or so, and had to write a review.. First - they really taste like candy. I went for gummies as I honestly can not swallow anymore stinky gross biotin, fish oil etc capsules.. Second - taking these during a quarantine was probably a bad idea... my hair is growing like crazy! I‚Äôm glad I fully committed to balayage over the last few years... I swear my hair has grown almost 2 inches in the last 2 months and I have the roots to prove it lol.. Third - I have crazy sensitive skin and definitely noticed in the past I would break out when taking certain supplements (usually hair/skin/nails formulas) and this has not happened with these.. Give them a try, worked well for me so far!

name: Daze
title: Original vitamins confirmed
content: Okay, I did some research because of some of the comments stating that fake vitamins were being received.. I posted pictures to help future shoppers make sure the product is genuine & original. According to Google, YouTube and many comments here, the package received, passes the test.. 1. The package has US official distribution info (fakes come from China).. 2. The bottles were sealed with plastic (fakes don‚Äôt have that).. 3. The Manufacturers info on the bottom should be like the one I posted (fakes will not have the same uniformed text).. 4. The seal is paper & aluminum (fakes only have aluminum).. 5. Color is like a light Tiffany blue (fakes are more green-ish teal with darker blue specs).. 6. Bears are distinct (fakes are less detailed and may have tiny holes throughout).. So there you have it! Now to wait on results. Just took my first 2 vitamins tonight, so did my 15 year old daughter.. I‚Äôll update results in 4 to 6 weeks time. Hoping these will work for our hair‚Äôs growth ‚ò∫ü§û.

content: I'm on my 2nd bottle of SugarBearHair vitamins. I am in love! I figured I'd try one bottle since a lot of reviews say they see a difference within 3-4 weeks. I'm sold! I have always had very fine thin hair and went on some awful meds a few years ago that really just destroyed my hair and made it super super thin. My hair just never bounced back. And I have tried everything! Nioxin, regular biotin, a combo of biotin and other vitamins, other special hair loss and thickening shampoos, nutriox vitamins, coconut oil, etc. Nothing ever seemed to really work. Until SugarBearHair... After about 3 days my hair already felt so much softer and healthier and insanely shiny (and my hair has always been fairly shiny but now it's insane!) I just started bottle #2 today, after 31 days my hair is fuller and thicker (I've been using X-fusion hair fibers as a filler for 2 years and haven't had to use it the past 2 weeks!!) and it's at least 1.5 inches longer. I will have to say during the first week I did get some bad breakouts around my chin. My skin is usually pretty good, but with some extra care it went away quickly, but totally worth it to see my hair magically transform!. If you are in doubt especially with the $30 price tag, just try it for one month!!

name: Ladybuggggs
title: My hair grows crazy slow and is frizz prone.
content: After about a week I noticed my hair was getting oily and leaving a ‚Äúgrease‚Äù type feel on my fingers. My scalp never gets oily even if i dont wash my hair for a few days. THATS how dry my scalp and hair have always been. To see my scalp have an oilyness to it was strange to me. Washed as normal the next day and I also noticed that night it was also sorta oily. The ::following:: day I noticed my hair wasn‚Äôt as frizzy and i had a few ‚Äúgood hair days‚Äù in a row which is SUPER odd for me. Two weeks in my roots area was softer feeling and I noticed my edges looking a little darker and fuller. Since my hair hardly grows i cam go about six weeks at times before its time to color my roots. Im almost a month in and at week four I already had to color my roots. Which is something i never ever have to do in a 3-4 week period.. So far i have noticed a big improvement with the overall health of not only my hair, but my scalp and hairline.. I honestly think these gummies are helping. I also think they give a slight boost in energy as with a multivitamin would do. I plan on buying an additional box and gladly paying out of pocket for these. I would definitely check these out, as if i can see a difference with the first bottle alone, i can only imagine the boost of growth these vitamins are likely capable of getting my hair to grow.. The taste is ‚Äúokay‚Äù. They definitely dont taste ugly at all. The only complaint ihave is these gummies are like mushy a little. They leave a little blue in the crevices of my teeth lol. Swishing water and swallowing the drink takes care of that; lol. But again thats me TRYING to find something to complain about, lol.. Seriously, i am beyond excited about the second bottle. I definitely would suggest trying these out!!

name: Amber J
title: Pretty good gummy hair supplement so far  updated
content: Update:. So I‚Äôve used an entire bottle and I can honestly say this is the best decision I have ever made for my hair. It‚Äôs shocking the difference this vitamin has made for my hair!! It‚Äôs silkier, smoother, breaks less and looks and feels really healthy. I do get bleach blonde highlights and my last appointment in June the hair dresser kinda fried my hair. It was shedding more breaking crazy easily and the ends were so dried out. I‚Äôve been trying to nourish it and repair it since then. I‚Äôve consistently used this vitamin for a whole month and I want to say I started to see and feel substantial results between 2-3 weeks. My hair started feeling silkier, it was breaking and shedding less (especially in the shower) and now a month in my hair looks and feels so healthy. I can‚Äôt rave enough about this vitamin or recommend it more!. Original:. This supplement has a unique kinda of texture to it. It feels firm when removed from the bottle but it chews and dissolves well. It doesn‚Äôt have a terrible vitamin taste to it but it also doesn‚Äôt have a fruity or sweet taste either. The taste is tolerable and fades after the gummy dissolves.. I love that this set includes 2 bottles to really be able to start to see the effects of the product. Now, I‚Äôve only been taking this for a couple days so, I know my review is a premature for results. I have very long hair that has been brittle and dry since my last hair appointment in June so I‚Äôm hoping this vitamin will help. I will be planning to update my review after the first bottle to note any changes and hopefully improvements I will see after a month of continued use.. I‚Äôll also say this set comes with a LOVELY large glass nail file that works incredibly well. I didn‚Äôt realize this set came with a nail file but, so far I am very happy with the bonus nail file gift.

name: Wayne
title: Awesome Biotin Supplement - Hair Skin & Nails
content: I have been on a biotin supplement regime for years. I have thinning hair and brittle nails. I try different supplements for my source of Biotin whenever I run out. These were impressive and quite tasty.. As mentioned, I have been on a biotin regime for years, and my only expectation of this product was to maintain the results I had already earned after years of Biotin use. These met my needs and I am pleased with the product.. If you are new to Biotin, you are not going to have amazing results in a month or two months of use. You need to give a Biotin regime a good six months to see impact. Your existing nails for example, need to grow out and you will get to the strong hard nails gown while you were on the Biotin. Your skin needs to purge the bad (hence why you may be getting breakouts). Keep with it - they will go away and you will be ecstatic with the results.

I have been taking them for a short while and the thing I most notice is my nails actually growing faster and healthier. My hair is recovering from postpartum blah-ness. I think I won‚Äôt notice a difference there quite as quickly however I have noticed I‚Äôm shedding hair less when I shower. I assume it‚Äôs the vitamin at this point as it started a bit after I began taking these. Sugar bear seems to be a reputable and popular name in the vita world and honestly I see why. name: Leo Pham
title: It Works For Male Pattern Baldness!
content: NOTE: We orderes ours directly from the manufacturer.. Long story short, I've tried a lot of biotin supplements, and SugarBearHair was the only one that made my hair come back! Forget those hormone-altering drugs, expensive implants, and whatever gimmick is out there.. I started losing my hair around 25, and by 29, I was ready to live with the buzzcut. I was already cutting my hair as short as possible, when my GF told me to try these. I was skeptical at first, because it looked like it was meant for women. But I had nothing else to lose, so why not! Was my bald going to get more bald!?. My hair just looked horrible when it got long, and trying to cover things up by growing it out wasn't an option anymore. You know it is beyond saving when your hair feels soft, as my hairline got worse it started feeling more and more airy/soft/smooth.. I honestly never believed these would even work. I thought it would be like all the other "hair/skin/nail" supplements... Junk. I chewed through all sorts of stuff, and the only thing that changed was how much money was left in my bank. I wish I had taken a picture before starting this regimen. But the photos started after I had finished my first bottle, so I don't have a record of how bad my hair originally was because I was a little ashamed of it, then I snapped a new one after every following bottle.. Some side-effects I noticed happening:. 1. My nails got really hard, thick, and had a shine to them.. 2. The vitamins affected all the other hair as well, it grows longer and thicker, like on my shoulders/nose/back. The hair on my face grows faster too, but it didnt get thicker.. 3. Skin feels a little more oily than normal.. Overall, if you've lost your hair due to MPB and are considering implants or drugs, give these a try first! I noticed a difference after just one bottle, so before taking more drastic measures, grab a bottle for $30 and see what happens. It is cheaper and less messy than Rogaine, that's for sure!. But one question I have is, what would happen if I stopped taking them? Would my hair go away again, or is it permanent.

name: Tomoko
title: Don't believe "led to a doctor's visit"
content: There is a highly upvoted review that says "led to a doctor's visit" and it seems to claim that her doctor said that high dose biotin commonly leads to thyroid issues. THIS IS A MISCOMMUNICATION. I looked it up, and high dose biotin is known to affect the TEST RESULTS, not your actual thyroid.. Here's a quote from a clinical journal that I read as I was researching it: "There are numerous reports of biotin interference with laboratory testing, specifically with thyroid function tests. Most commonly, biotin use can result in falsely high levels of T4 and T3 and falsely low levels of TSH, leading to either a wrong diagnosis of hyperthyroidism or that the thyroid hormone dose is too high.". When I read that person's review, I was like damn, that's intense. But it's not actually true (at least, not the way she said it, which is the confusing part). I hope you'll upvote this review so that other people know! Because yes, these vitamins work :) like all high dose biotin supplements do. These ones just taste good and have other great vitamins, like vitamin D.. There are known side effects of heavy biotin usage, like skin rashes, so just be careful and listen to your body. Biotin is a water-soluble vitamin which means your body gets rid of what it doesn't need through, um, your urine - whereas fat-soluble vitamins are stored in your liver and potentially lead to serious problems. So high doses of water-soluble vitamins like this are less risky. But again, do your own research, listen to your body, and don't believe everything you read, including my own review! :)

name: Shannon McGregor
title: Amazing product!!! Even for Synthroid users!!!
content: I love this product!!! I can finally take vitamins for my hair & nails - AHHH-Mazing!!!. However, I saw someone describe a thyroid issue due to these vitamins and that is a highly false accusation. I am on Synthroid for my thyroid. The fact of the matter is, biotin use can result in the falsification of high levels of T4 and T3 on a CBC. It could also falsify low levels of TSH, leading to either a wrong diagnosis of hyperthyroidism or that the thyroid hormone dose is too high. This could lead to a misdiagnosis of Graves Disease. This goes for any vitamin/hair vitamin... It‚Äôs a general rule of thumb and only to be discussed with your DR. Not to be blamed on a company. This product works wonders when used as directed.

title: This is super important!
content: My mother is a dermatologist, and she and I really want people to understand that it is not the gummies that are actually breaking you out. If you are breaking out, that‚Äôs a sign that your body does not handle that amount. The best thing you can do instead is swap these out for smaller dosage capsules you can find at Whole Foods or anywhere else. These are just an enjoyable way of taking vitamins but if it‚Äôs not for you, stick to something simpler.

name: Viridian Tide
title: Let's talk about hair growth, acne and product discoloration
content: HAIR GROWTH - So first of all ... this stuff actually does help with my hair growth. I typically have a difficult time growing my hair (it's slow AF) but these vitamins have accelerated my growth significantly with just 1 bottle. I'm almost on my 2nd bottle now and I've seen perhaps an inch of growth this last month where I would normally only see a quarter to a half an inch.. ACNE- many people say that this product gave them cystic acne. I am not one of those people but I suspect those who suffer from this side effect have a biotin sensitivity. These vitamins (while they somehow work better for me than any other supplement) have about the same amount of biotin as most other hair supplements. So if you don't have an acne reaction with other hair growth vitamins, go ahead and give these a try.. DISCOLORATION - there are people in these reviews that claim the vitamins are fake because some receive bottles with a darker colored gummy - almost a greenish color. I was really bummed to see that I did in fact receive the greenish color rather than the light blue. I still took them and they worked beautifully, but just to be sure I wasn't scammed, I ordered a second bottle straight from the sugar bear hair website. My 2nd bottle is identical to the greenish ones I got from Amazon; both are well within their expiration dates. I would have to guess that the varying color may be due to heat conditions during shipping or possibly a product blend change from the manufacturer. I don't know. But they DO work for me where countless others have failed and I will continue to order them.

name: Whitney
title: Works like magic ‚ô° UPDATE!!!
content: Good flavor, I only take 1 pill vs 2/day as my body doesn't handle too much biotin very well. I received the bottles on January 30th so it's only been a week and 4 days at HALF the recommended dose. My skin isn't breaking out but I'm not sure if it's due to drinking half a gallon of water per day since biotin is water soluble, or because I'm on acne medication but it's helping my hair growth tremendously. Shaved my hair for cancer donation and it's already growing back and filling in so fast. It's also gone from medium brown to dark brown but that may be genetics. Overall, I'm VERY satisfied with the results do far. :) UPDATE: These photos were taken a month from the original post w/time stamps to show proof. In total, 3 1/4" growth. I pulled the rest behind my ear to show comparison to length in first photo with ear length. No breakouts so far but I now drink a full gallon of water a day so that may help. This product is great. 3 1/4" from January 30th to today, April 23rd, so nearly an inch a month.

title: Tastes delicious & strengthens hair
content: I finally jumped on the Sugar Bear Hair bandwagon just to see what all the hype was about and I‚Äôm glad I did! It‚Äôs obviously a little pricey, but in my opinion, worth it! I normally only take 1 a day instead of 2, but I have noticed my hair feels and looks stronger and healthier since I‚Äôve started this. I‚Äôm curious to see if it will help with faster growth long term. They taste so good, which is a definite plus! I have naturally fine hair, so I wanted something to help strengthen it and this was definitely worth the plunge!

name: FruityPebbles
title: Yes it does work!
content: Yes it does work, but you need to be patient.. I think people need to manage their expectations, don‚Äôt use Sugar Bear Hair vitamins for one month and expect to see miracle results that might work for some but don‚Äôt reject the product because this hasn‚Äôt worked for you. With most vitamins like this you need to be taking the product for at least 3 months before you can see a result, 6 months is more ideal in my view.. I‚Äôve been waiting a long time to write this review because I think you need to do so to be able to give an informed opinion. I‚Äôve been taking Sugar Bear Hair for around 18 months and what I have experienced is the following:-. Hair growth from shoulder length hair to full bra strap length and I expect my hair to be at the middle of my back within the next few months.. Hair thickness, my hair was thin and see through before, it no longer is.. Texture change, the texture of my hair has noticeable changed, it‚Äôs beautifully silky but it also has a coarseness to it to make it look full and heavy.. I can‚Äôt put this ALL down to Sugar Bear Hair, I‚Äôve been steadily improving my diet and taking in green powders also, so these things combined have contributed to my my progression. I also take excellent care of my hair, use all salon products, these also help.. Just some thing that I have noted from other reviews:-. ‚ÄúIt doesn‚Äôt stop hair fall‚Äù. Well no vitamin is going to stop hair fall/shedding. Shedding hair is normal and it happens to everyone. However excessive hair shedding is not normal and should be checked out by a clinician to rule out any medical issues.. What I will say is you need to take plenty of water with these. Significant water in take - I feel, will really enhance the efficacy of the product.. It is very expensive, but I find I don‚Äôt need to use anything else, just this and my green powders are doing the trick for me.. I expect my hair to be at waist length next year; not bad for someone who could not get their hair past shoulder length before.

name: Nia Jones
title: Hair healthier than ever before!
content: My hair used to be long, blonde, and curly, and after years of abuse I finally decided to cut it short. Then dye it seven times in five months. Eventually it got to my shoulders but was so knotty even after I would brush it I had to cut it once more to just past my shoulders and dyed it orange.. I love long hair and miss it a tremendous amount as it was my identity and because of my hair's coarse, curly texture I find that in order to keep it healthy I need to cut it often which stalls the growth process. So I decided to give this a chance and will never look back!. It has been a month now since I've started taking these vitamins and nearly seven weeks since my hair cut, by which time my hair would be wiry, dry, and snapping off, but it's not! My hair has grown back to how it was before I cut it, and is so healthy I might be able to get another month in before cutting it again, which I hope will be the case so that I can get my waist length locks back!. I have never been so happy with the results of hair growth vitamins and I am buying my next bottle! I advise people to get this if you want your hair to be healthy!

name: Katy
title: These vitamins are amazing but I'm spot prone.
content: I am Vegetarian and was looking for something to help boost my vitamin intake without buying lots of separate vitamins.. I know everyone has different skin types, different hair types etc. but I truly believe these vitamins work so well for me. I have previously taken hairburst which also worked but wasn't as exciting to take. I genuinely look forward to taking these every morning, they taste gooooood!. I noticed another review stating that the Biotin in these will cause acne for sensitive skin and yes that is true, they CAN cause acne... I already have acne and I believe these did affect my skin, I did start getting quite painful spots on a daily basis. I wouldn't let this put you off trying them, if you have a break out just stop using them!. I had my hair coloured right as I started taking this vitamin which has acted as a fantastic indicator for how quickly it's growing. My roots are making me anxious.. I have had to take a break from these to let my skin settle down which is an absolute shame, I just wish they were cheaper (I have tried cheaper alternatives from Tesco but saw no results whatsoever). I love the way they make my hair feel and grow!!. Give them a try!

name: Florence
title: It works! Included pictures, judge for yourself

By taking one bottle over 6 weeks I've personally noticed a big difference for me (as my hair doesn't grow very fast, my nails are also no longer brittle!). + Gummy bears are really yummy and cute. + Friends have noticed a big difference, without me fishing for a compliment .... Con: The product is over priced. It won't change your dna, if you have fine hair you will still have fine hair.

name: Allison
title: It works !!
content: First of all, the taste is good, as I expected based on other reviews. I truly believe these have made a huge difference in my hair growth. Back around Halloween I cut my hair and the stylist cut off way too much and it was literally chin length. I hated it and wanted to quickly grow it out a bit so I decided to buy these after all of the reviews. I wish I had pictures but I never took any. My hair has grown so much faster than it normally does. In the last 3 months I‚Äôve had at least 5 or 6 inches of growth, and normally I only see maybe half an inch a month. My hair isn‚Äôt where it was before, but it‚Äôs definitely long enough for me to be happy with it now. The only downside is the fact that these make you break out. My face is mostly ok but my back is NOT! So I will likely stop taking these after I finish my 3rd bottle.

name: Arden
title: After years of loyal use, I'm saying goodbye to these.
content: I am so sad that they changed the formula. I had been taking these since 2020, and my hair has grown significantly in that time after a full decade of trying everything else to get it to grow out. As other reviews have mentioned, the new formula does not taste nearly as good as the previous one, and I noticed that the ingredients have changed and contain less of certain vitamins. They're also much harder to chew now. I would forgive that all, but for the first time since starting these, my skin is breaking out like crazy now, and I have never had acne-prone skin. I tried eliminating different skin products in search of a culprit, but I realize now it must be the new gummies. I will be switching to another brand immediately.

This time the bottle is changed (new design) AND also the vitamins are different. They are a different bear shape, darker, waxier in look and taste, more chewy than soft. Is this some kind of updated formula? I am not happy with it. I'm sad because they were so good at keeping my hair and nails nice but this recent batch is changed enough for me to want to switch to another brand.

name: Meggy
title: Great for Hair Purposes
content: This is an amazing hair supplement. I've bleached my hair and greatly damaged it in the process. Ever since then, I've been trying every hair product out there targeted to 'repair' damaged hair, stop breakage, and overall restore your hair. I've been taking biotin for a few months now and have noticed that my nails are longer and a lot stronger, but I haven't seen much growth or improvement with my hair so I decided to look for something made specifically for the hair. I saw a ton of Intstagram posts about this product and the Tiffany blue color got me, so I decided I would give them a go.. The taste: these gummies are seriously the most delicious gummies I've had. Sometimes I wish I could take more than two.They kind of stick to your teeth, though. But it's not a big deal.. The first day I took them, I started bloating up and my face started getting bigger, too. Not sure why. But just a couple days in, I was already seeing improvement. Sadly, I started to break out like crazy. Now, I seldom get pimples or blemishes on my face. So it was a little discouraging when I saw that I was getting pimples. A new pimple would pop up every day and I considered putting a pause on the gummies as I began to have acne marks. My face still bloats up a bit from taking these and I am still getting pimples, but I am in the second week of taking these so I'm still hopeful that these side-effects are temporary from my body still adjusting to them.. My hair felt so much softer less than one week in. Its appearance was already improving, too! It was not dry, coarse, or brittle anymore (I am also using a cleansing conditioner and hair lotion) and I noticed that my hair was already drastically shinier, tamed, and soft. My hair is FINALLY on the road to recovery!. Though I am experiencing breakouts and face-bloat, I am definitely going to keep taking these as this is the only thing that has worked for me so far. I definitely recommend this product to anyone experience hair breakage/damaged hair. These seriously changed my (hair's) life!

name: JME
title: Does it work?  Maybe
content: After having covid, my hair started falling out by hunks. A friend recommended I give these Sugar Bears a try. A month later and my hairdresser says she sees a few new baby hairs coming out. Did these help? I don't know. My physician said hair growth would return naturally, just may take longer. So maybe it's just my own body recovering. ??? They taste good. Don't get stuck to my teeth. And they do have good stuff for hair and nails. My nails are ridged and splitting up the middle post-covid too.

name: David griffin
title: 2nd time I received brown color and horrible tasting Sugar Babies. Different shape are they old?
content: I think I‚Äôm receiving old product. Not happy about this.

name: dalia ruiz
title: Not worth it to me
content: They work. I bought them due to bad shedding and my hair is now shiny and longer. On top of that my hair has stopped shedding. As an added bonus my nails started to grow. This surprised me because I am a bad nail bitter. However, that being said I got really bad acne from these vitamins. Not all skins are the same so you may have to try them for yourself to see what effect it will have on you. I however have always battled with acne and had finally had it under control for almost a year now with curology. Within a week of taking these gummies my skin flared. I thought I would finish the month before deciding if I would buy them again or not and what kind of review I would give. Plus at 30 dollars a bottle I was going to get my money‚Äôs worth. I am now two days from finishing the bottle and still have the bad flared up acne. So I give it a 4 star rate because it does work but while the product works the side effects are not worth it for me personally.

name: Trinitaria Altschul
title: Loved it even came with cute brush
content: Loved it even came with cute brush

content: I am trying to let my hair grow out so I purchased these based on the reviews. I am on my 3rd day and waiting to see if they work. It is a little pricey for the quantity.
