title: Great for hair growth, not great for skin
content: My hair started growing really fast once I started taking these, that happened at about a week in, the only thing I want to know is that your skin might get a little funky. I got really bad acne while I took this so I won't be using it again or trying it again, but it does what it says it's going to do

name: Jamie
title: It really works!!!!!
content: The flavor is so sweet. They aren‚Äôt chewy like gummies. They‚Äôre more like chewable TUMS texture. Easily dissolves when chewing them. I‚Äôm on my second bottle. I have suffered many years with PCOS. My hair is so thin, that you can easily see my scalp. After 3 weeks of taking this product, I‚Äôm starting to feel little stubbles throughout my scalp. I used to be able to rub my scalp and feel my actual skin on my scalp. Now, I can‚Äôt feel my skin on my scalp. I didn‚Äôt give it a 5 star because I can‚Äôt actually see a difference, but I can feel the difference. I‚Äôm sure another 2 months I‚Äôll start to SEE the new hair. Also, if you‚Äôre trying to grow your nails out, this will cover that too. I feel like I‚Äôm cutting my nails more than usual.

name: Daniah
title: Great but,,
content: Those are good buttt i feel girls that I gained weight too. I‚Äôm the type of person who has a constant weight. I don‚Äôt gain and loose weight easily. But with these gums I really gained weight. So if u wanna take them, you have to take them with making a diet

name: Jay
title: Maybe Heisenberg made it. It's good stuff.
content: I didn't want to believe the hype. I didn't want to buy gummy bears that purportedly made my hair pretty. But my Kim K. Cult-worshipping friend swore by the holy Kanye that it worked. And my stress has been so bad, my dye jobs so severe, my hormones so out of whack, that desperation drove me to purchase. And so I took these little blue candies, two per day, for a month. And to my dismay, they began to work. My hair wasn't falling out as much in the shower, even my nails were seemingly growing back. Lies, Kanye, lies, I shouted, wallet tossed across the room. So I went back to CVS-brand biotin. My progress had reversed, and my hair started being wonky again. When I gave back in, having read a buzzfeed article about how sugar bear hair has about 2x all the crud they state on the label, I made a compromise with myself. Only 1 gummy per day, along with a strong multivitamin routine and good diet. I think that's where I'll stay. It actually... works.. Update: Sugarbear still works. I'm still stressed and sick and it keeps my hair from falling out in heaping clumps. That saves my sanity, because chronic illness sucks enough. However, this price is steep, considering I'm only taking 1/day and can stretch this two months...32 bucks a month for hair vitamins is absurd. Can y'all, seeing as I know you're popular as all creation right now, adjust prices? It's not sustainable.

name: Sue, Crofton, MD
title: I was allergic
content: These gummies worked great for my daughter. She noticed her nails getting stronger just after a week of taking them and feels like her hair was more lustrous. I had an allergic reaction to them. These are the second hair vitamin that I'm allergic to, so obviously I'm the problem, not the gummy. They tasted good too.

name: Jennifer
title: I was sent old gummies!
content: I havent used these gummies for very long so I can't really say if they work but my friend turned me on to these and hers were always blue and smell good. Mine are green and have a really odd taste.

name: Ashley M.
title: Verified hair growth results!
content: For months I was having issues with my hair falling out at an increased rate and my natural color looking dull. I was taking other biotin gummies but did not see a drastic difference. I've been taking Sugar Bear Hair vitamins for two months now and I've noticed a huge difference! I've received comments that my hair looks brighter and longer, and I definitely agree! I would say my hair is growing half an inch faster than usual, and my hair usually grows VERY fast. I would say in two months my hair is two inches longer, but I unfortunately forgot to take a before picture. My favorite parts though are definitely the shine and just the overall health of my hair. I've noticed much less hair falling out while in the shower and less breakage after wearing a ponytail for an extended period of time.. Now for the side effects. While I do not have the acne issues noted by some, I do notice more hair growth......everywhere. I've never noticed the peach fuzz on my face before, but I definitely do now! I have to shave much more frequently which has been a drawback as I don't have a ton of dark or course body hair. The taste is pretty good to me, but I will note that my mom tried one and couldn't stand it.

name: Anastasia Dragomirova
title: Cheaper and More Fresh from SugarBear Site
content: I bought one container from Amazon to try and absolutely loved it! It is very tasty and I could tell the difference in my hair. However, to buy more I went to the SugarBear site after reading reviews about the freshness. It is true! Vitamins are softer and taste fresher from the original site and cost less if you buy 3 month supply or more!

name: Brenda Tolentino
title: Way to sweet
content: I don‚Äôt know exactly what I was expecting from a product called SUGAR bear lol but these are way to sweet. I did notice growth on my nails especially. They are good but overall I feel they are overpriced in comparison to nature‚Äôs bounty hair skin and nails which does the same thing and has better flavor.

name: Faruqi
title: Tasty supplement
content: It's like eating candy

name: Carmen Malacari
title: Strengthens hair
content: Flavor, easy to take and results

name: Amber
title: I like, but heed the warnings!
content: I have been using these for a little over two weeks. Already, I think I am starting to see a change in my hair. But, it's definitely affecting my skin. I was hesitant to buy these because of some of the reviews talking about these vitamins making them breakout, but I decided to give them a shot. Just a couple days into taking this, I started to develop cystic acne in places I never breakout, such as the middle of my chin and the center of my cheeks. It's usually only one big bump I'm dealing with at a time, but they take forever to go away. I'm hoping the cystic acne is just a early side-effect, as a result of something like "purging" and goes away quickly, as some claim. I'm also going to try to drink more water, because that could definitely be the issue. But, as a real person who wants my hair to grow desperately, I want to warn everyone that the cystic acne reviews are not to be taken lately. I'll update after continued use!. Update: After a month of use, the breakouts have stopped completely! I feel like my skin is better than ever now. My hair feels longer and thicker already. I‚Äôm about to buy another bottle!

name: Kristinamoreno74
title: Great but please wash your face
content: I‚Äôve been taking these for about a week and half and as far as length of hair and nails there‚Äôs not a huge difference but the feeling of my hair is better. My hair is nice and soft after I wash it and then a day later it‚Äôs dry brittle and just icky(mom buns don‚Äôt help that) I will say I have in between skin where sometimes it‚Äôs oily other times it‚Äôs dry and since taking it my skin is oilier then usual so wash your face Daily. I‚Äôm seeing people are breaking out and although I have oil I wash my face everyday and I haven‚Äôt had one. Everyone is different tho. Will update if I have any lengthening

name: Carlix Rin
title: Tasty, but did they really work or was it just natural hair growth?
content: My hair grew, but I‚Äôm not sure if it was due to the gummies or not. The flavor was interesting and I chewed them (bc i can‚Äôt swallow anything whole) so I‚Äôm not sure if they‚Äôre ‚Äúeasy to swallow‚Äù whole. They did leave my tongue blue for some part of the day, but overall it was a nice treat. Other people on here are saying that if you just take your vitamins and eat a healthy diet that your hair will grow just about the same. I‚Äôm honestly not sure, but these are vegan and tasty, so I‚Äôd say they‚Äôre pretty good, but I can‚Äôt assure you that they actually work. I only used them for a month.

name: Patricia Perez
title: I wish they were the same color as the ones you would get from ordering from the actual seller
content: I just started these a few days ago. so i haven‚Äôt noticed any results. they taste decent. i do bleach my hair so i‚Äôm hoping i can still get the same results as the other girls who are brunettes. I am a little skeptical because the gummies i received are more on the greener color side then what they should be. They should be the color of the bottle label. hopefully them being this color doesn‚Äôt mean they are old and less effective.. UPDATE:. so i received my 2nd month today and these actually were different in color ( the same color as the label) and they taste so much better !! they were a lot more tangier the first time when they were greener in color. i have noticed my hair isn‚Äôt falling out as much but no difference in growth . will keep this updated

name: Shley
title: Taste good and they work.
content: I have been taking these for over 2 months, I just started my third bottle. People started commenting how long my hair is getting. I am starting to notice it's getting past the length where I felt like it was stuck. So I would day these are working, my hair is very curly and a lot of the length is eaten up by my curls being so tight, but to notice a difference with it curly is pretty big for me. They taste great, I usually hate the way gummy vitamins taste, but these really taste like candy. They are expensive though, 30 dollars for a month supply.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Improvement
content: After 90 days, the most impressive improvement is my eyebrows. Patchy spots are filling in. My nails are not as brittle but may take a few more months to see a definite improvement. No noticeable difference in head hair.

name: Victoria
title: Tastes good.  Slow results or none at all.
content: It really is good as the Kardashians say it is. But don't expect fast hair growth or your bald spot to be completely filled with hair. I've been taking these gummies for about a year and I do think it has improved the health of my nails. The bald spot on my head is still a little sparse and my eye lashes still feel like they're at the same length as it was a year ago. If you can afford to take these gummies over a lomg period time, sure try this out. However, if you're short on cash, save your money to find better hair-growth treatment.

name: Areeb
title: Its good
content: So im going to be very honest its a good product both my mom and I are using it, however it has slightly reduced hairfall for my mom who needed it more, and had thickened my hair but i dont have too much of a hairfall issue. So i would suggest it works differently on everyone and it takes a while to get results but overall not a bad product.

name: HSIN YI LEE
title: It did work
content: My daughter's eyelashes are growing~

name: Jamie Garner
title: Great Vitamins, Not So Great Price
content: I have ordered these vitamins a few times, as I have been growing my hair out for my wedding. I really liked the taste and the balance of vitamins within them, but I was struggling with the price. Especially since you have to take two a day. After 2 bottles, I decided to try another brand that was similar from Target, and I immediately regretted it. These taste like gummies you would eat as a child, and the store bought ones were awful tasting. I also thought that I was saving money by purchasing a cheaper brand at the store, but the instructions said that you should take 3 of those a day. When I did the math, the prices ended up being comparable.. I definitely noticed a change in my hair and nail regrowth after taking these vitamins for a few months. They are my #1 choice for biotin related vitamins. The only issue I have is with the price. Paying over $30 a month for a hair and nail vitamin is a hard sell if you are on a budget, especially if it causes you to need to get your hair or nails done more frequently.

name: Amazon Customer
title: So they do work.....
content: I‚Äôm have dark hair, thick eyebrows, arm hairs, have to shave about every other day normally. About a week after I finished a months worth of these I felt like a chia pet. I‚Äôm talking unibrow, side burns, leg hairs growing so fast I gave up and conceded to being an actual Sasquatch. The hair on my head did grow about an inch however, so technically, they worked. I bought another bottle for my fair haired light skinned step-daughter to see if they can help her hard up grow hair get a little pep in it‚Äôs step. We shall see.

name: Bishoy Youssef
title: Chewy but not the best tasting
content: These vegan gummy‚Äôs are chewy but don‚Äôt tast the best

name: Sam
title: Yummy, worked, BUT....
content: So these vitamins taste SO good! It‚Äôs hard not to keep munching on them. I tried them for a month and I do feel like they helped my hair grow faster. I diffidently had to shave more often lol. BUT they also made me break out... I don‚Äôt typically have bad acne but I am prone to breakout if I don‚Äôt keep up with my skin routine. Nothing seemed to help my skin in the month that I took these. And it‚Äôs been about 3 weeks since I stopped and my face is clearing right up! So I know it was these vitamins. I tried to drink a lot of water but that didn‚Äôt seem to help either. I probably won‚Äôt buy these again, or any other biotin just because of that reason. I don't think it was these vitamins specifically that broke me out I just think it‚Äôs biotin in general. If I did decide to take biotin again I would probably get these because they‚Äôre so yummy and they worked!

name: Cindy C.
title: It works
content: Hair and nails

name: BBoo
title: Won't order again
content: My last order of 3, one bottle had moisture in it and was discolored. I won't be ordering these again. I will just try Biotin 10,000 and see it that works

name: Amazon Customer
title: Seems to be gluten free
content: I‚Äôve only been taking them for a week so I can‚Äôt speak to results yet but the taste is very good.. I have celiac disease and can‚Äôt eat anything with gluten in it. While the container says it contains ‚Äúno gluten‚Äù it does not say gluten free or GF (this is the standard you want to see) so I was a little worried. Good news, thus far I haven‚Äôt had a reaction from them that I can tell.

name: Bianca Richmond
title: Decent
content: I enjoy the taste and find easy to take. I have some balding around my hairline. I noticed results after 2 bottles.

name: Kk
title: I had dry, thick hair until.....
content: I am an African American woman and I believe that for you to grow long hair it has to be healthy. Damaged hair will not grow. These pills change your overall hair cortex. They have honestly penetrated my strands to repair them from the inside out. My hair has never been more shiny, bouncy and just healthy looking overall. I love it! But the reason I give it 4 stars is because I am a hairy girl, and this doesn't just grow your head hair it grows ALL hair. So I have to see what I want to sacrifice in a way. Do I want long flowing hair with a mustache? I don't think anyone does lol. I will re-purchase again but ill try to do it every couple of month's because I don't want it to be a constant growth. These pills have helped fill in my eyebrows and have helped grow my baby hairs back. So yes they do grow hair but remember everyone's body is different and my experience probably wont be yours. But yes they do grow hair and STRONG nails. I've never gone this long without my nail's breaking.

name: bernard pelchat
title: It does what it should
content: My hair lost diminished a lot

name: Krissandra Theisen
title: After one bottle my hair and nails are growing!
content: I just finished my first bottle today and have a new one ready to open tomorrow. I color my hair and I believe my roots have grown out faster than normal. I think I have a little more length too, but I‚Äôm going to get through my second bottle before I truly decide if they‚Äôre worth it or not. On a good note...my nails are growing like crazy!

name: arelimartinez
title: Do not have any difference on my falling hair.
content: The flavor is really good , but I don‚Äôt see any difference on my falling hair.

name: Leslie
title: Surprisingly good
content: So, I honestly tried this product on a whim. I had read a few reviews online and most seemed to be positive. What's funny is that after taking them for 3 weeks, I went to my hairdresser. Mind you it had been about 6 weeks since the last time I had seen her, but she couldn't believe how much my hair had grown, especially considering it's winter and hair growth begins to slow.. As for the acne others have reported, I haven't had any problems with that, which is pretty amazing because I break out regularly, though more to my skincare and makeup routine as opposed to my diet.. I also saw some reports of stomach sensitivity which I also did not experience. I took my vitamins every morning while waiting on my coffee to brew.. I would say for the price, it's a great product. Are there other products that will cause you hair to grow faster? Certainly, but you're going to pay for it. These taste good, are effective, and reasonably priced.

name: Tracy B
title: Breakouts - temporary small price to pay for great results
content: I read the reviews about people breaking out after taking the sugar bear gummies, but decided to try them anyway. And I‚Äôm so glad I did! I did end up breaking out about a week after I started using them, but once that first bout of blemishes cleared up (about 4 or 5 days) then my skin went back to normal and I haven‚Äôt broken out again since. That being said, I can totally feel and see my hair getting thicker, softer and actually growing! My hair stopped growing like 5 years ago or more and began to thin and fall out as I started getting older. I spent Hundreds if not thousands of dollars on extensions for years because I was so embarrassed at how awful my hair had become. So I have since rid myself of the extensions and am so much happier with my hair. I‚Äôm about to buy my 3rd bottle and looking forward to continued improvements.

name: Jennie
title: I had to cut my once amazing hair b/c it became brittle and gross and was ...
content: I bought these as an experiment. Due to an autoimmune disorder, I had to cut my once amazing hair b/c it became brittle and gross and was falling out/breaking off. I was desperate to find something to help my hair grow faster and to help restore the healthy consistency. While this does not help with the actual consistency (I use oil for that), it does seem to be helping my hair to grow faster. They're expensive and honestly not as tasty as some of the reviews boast -- but I won't kick them out of my mouth, they do taste good, just not amazing. I'm on month 2 and will probably give them one more month to push my hair past the point where the length will overshadow some of the damage. I based my purchasing off of an article I read where staff members tried them for 2 months and announced their results. (i.e. they weren't bought b/c every celebrity and their mother have been promoting them).

name: JC
title: Good but has artificial blue1 coloring
content: Too early to tell if this helps thicken and strengthen my hair but I purchased it because a good friend recommended it saying it‚Äôs effective for her. Tastes great and good soft texture. Only negative is that it does have artificial coloring with blue 1. I‚Äôd rather they didn‚Äôt have a pretty blue color than to have artificial coloring in it.

name: Carolina maria morel betancourt
title: Me salen granos y espinillas
content: Es bueno el producto pero sacan granos y espinillas en la cara y el craneo

name: Kindle Customer
title: Kickstart Your Regrowth
content: My hair unfortunately broke off due to a hair product and I was quite devastated to lose all my beautiful length. I purchased these to give my hair a quick start on the growth and I have not been disappointed. Everytime I go to the salon, my beautician comments on how much my hair is growing. In a little over three months, my hair has grown at least an inch and that is baring the previous damage that had to finally fall off. I have not had any new shedding or damage/breakage since using this product. It's going to take some time but I know that my hair will be back to its previous length and this has helped. It is a little pricey so, I think I may just go to a biotin vitamin to save money but this definitely gave me the boost I needed to help my regrowing journey.

name: katelyn
title: If you are vitamin deficient this definitely works
content: I have always been vitamin deficient, and my hair doesn‚Äôt grow. It grew 1 inch in 5 months before the vitamins. After one month of the vitamins, my hair has begun to increase significantly fast. I think it has grown about an inch in the past month. My eyebrows and eyelashes used to be naturally thin and short, but they have also started to grow think and long. I highly recommend this product, but customers need to know what they need (vitamin wise) before purchasing. It causes acne all over my face, but that results in my hair are too good to stop. Do some research online before purchasing to avoid any weird or unusual side effects.

name: kathy weist
title: It‚Äôs too soon to realize any success with hair growth
content: Easy to chew- soft enough. Tasyes good

name: Latrisha Shaw
title: Tasty treat
content: These vitamin taste amazing not sure yet if they're really growing my hair is my first bottle will update later here's a picture after a couple weeks of using them.

name: Maureen
title: One month, it may be beginning to work:)
content: Recently my hair started falling out rapidly. Not sure what the cause was, menopause, bad shampoo, stress?I started taking Sugar Bear about a month ago along with other biotin, multivitamins, etc. I believe my hair is starting to fall out less. That‚Äôs a win for me. I will follow up with another review in a couple months. Needless to say I ordered my second bottle. Note it has 60 bears but you need to take 2 per day, hence a 30 day supply.

name: Manuela O.
title: Porque es eficiente me gusta
content: <images>

name: EmmiK
title: I was skeptical but it works
content: I rarely write reviews, and I bought this thinking it wouldn't really work but my hair is super fine so I figured I'd try it. I'm going on my 3rd month, and I have to sayit world for me in two ways. First my hair has grown much faster than it normally does. 2nd and most exciting, it has improved the texture of my hair, it actually feels thicker. I don't think it's in my head because I'm a nurse and several of my coworkers commenting that my hair seemed healthier and thicker, even going so far to start feeling my ponytail and saying it felt thicker to them too. It is significant but not incredibly drastic, it's not going to totally change your hair type.. Also, I've tried Biotin in the past and broke out horribly. This has not happened at all with these vitamins. I'll continue to use them.

name: Stac
title: Good gummies
content: These work well, this is my second bottle! Wish they were a tad cheaper but it is what it is!

name: Carlos Cabrera
title: Van muy bien
content: Buen sabor,facil de consumir

name: Sara
title: They taste great but don't make my hair grow as fast as others
content: It could just be me, but they didn't make my hair grow very fast at all. I took them for 2 years and my hair grew only a slight bit faster than it usually does.

name: Nik
title: Thin & Fine Hair
content: I have thin/fine/straight hair that grows incredibly slow and wanted to see how these gummies work. They are pretty tasty and had no problem taking them. However remembering to take them is another story. I keep them in my desk at work, so I only took them during the week. I also had my hair trimmed during the 30 days, so kinda shot myself in the foot with this project from that start. What I can say I noticed is that my hair felt a tiny bit thicker, I did see a little growth and my usual amount of shedding decreased a little bit. I think I am going to take these again to see how well they work but this time take the consistently and not trim my hair.

name: Make-Up Lover
title: Taste Amazing
content: These vitamins taste amazing. I have become addicted to eating them and look forward to the next treat. I'm not sure if they are worth the price or if they are just Hype. I'm vegetarian so that is what initially attracted me because I have a hard time finding cruelty free gummy supplements. I will update my review after I finish my bottle. In addition, I use Tea Tree Shampoo & Conditioner.. **Update** :. I Have finished my one month supply, it went by very quickly. Mostly because they were so addicting. I didn't get any crazy amount of hair growth however I did notice less shedding when I brush my hair. Unfortunately these are out of stock on Amazon otherwise I would re-order. My hair feels soft but I'm not sure if it's mostly because of the shampoo and hair products I use.

name: iliana
title: Many pros, one possible con
content: Only used SugarBear Hair vitamins for a month but I did notice changes in my hair. For one I have dry, curly hair and while using these vitamins my hair felt less dry and had a shiny look to it. The vitamins also helped me grow back more hair ( had lost a lot of it from bleach and dye products). Although, this vitamin is beneficial for hair grow etc, I think it is overpriced. That being said, if you someone has the extra cash and wants to try this product I encourage them to. If you dont have the extra money, please know that their are less expensive alternative vitamins for hair growth.. Pros: Helps grow hair in length and abundance, gives dry hair a nice shiny look. Cons: price

name: Lee-Roma Swan
title: My hair is growing, wish it was faster
content: I chew them or suck on them, so yeah, it‚Äôs easy to swallow if you chewed it first. I will not recommend you swallow whole. They are gummy bears. Sweet, great flavor, but if you suck them your tongue will be blue, if you chew them, brush your teeth to avoid cavities.

name: Bailey Reed
title: It‚Äôs Okay
content: I do see that my hair is shinier, maybe even feels a little thicker, but the growth wasn‚Äôt as insane as I thought it would be! Probably just my high expectations or difficult hair. Still recommend!

name: Em30
title: Good results in a month
content: I purchased these gummies after my sister-in-law tried them and said her hair had good growth results with them. They‚Äôve very tasty, it‚Äôs like eating coated gummy bears instead of vitamins. I definitely had hair growth! It was quite impressive for only a month‚Äôs worth! Only downside was I did notice more acne than normal. I usually don‚Äôt break out or have more than 3 or 4 bumps on my face at a time but with this, I had quite a few, especially the deep, bruise feeling ones. Worth the money for my hair though!

name: Astrid Perez Oviedo
title: No acne to me. Worth the try
content: I read some reviews talking about acne. I don‚Äôt have any acne but I also don‚Äôt feel a huge difference with one bottle. I think is worth the try because they are really good. Will try a second one to give another chance and see if I feel the difference. But no secondary effects I could see or anything

name: Lexie
title: They worked for me, but also caused me to break out
content: Firstly, I have curly hair that seems to take forever to grow. I tried these for one month because I had seen so many good reviews about them. When taking them, even for just a month, I did notice my hair grow out quicker than it usually does. I also noticed my nails grew a lot faster and stronger than they ever have before (I typically have really thin and flaky nails). The only reason I didn't rate these 5 stars is because when taking them I broke out terribly. So just something to consider if you typically have oily skin or just already prone to acne. Other than that these are pretty darn amazing and they taste good too!

name: Shelbs
title: Made nails grow fast, hair not so much
content: Pros: holy crap, my nails grew SO fast!! They were super strong (genetically I have brittle nails) and I was very impressed. My skin cleared up strangely enough as well. Also when I didn't renew my supply ( I had a tonsillectomy and wasn't allowed to take any supplements/vitamins beforehand), within a week I noticed a huge difference--my nails chipped much easier and they ended up all breaking off, and my acne came back real nasty like.. Cons: Yeah hair was shiny and felt great, but didn't really grow any faster. Anywhere from 1/2 inch to 3/4 inch in a month. About your average monthly growth, so I liked it fine.

name: Happyshopper
title: Taste good. Easy on the stomach.
content: Taste good. Only took for 1 month due to a lack of affordability, so I‚Äôm not sure how well they work. I believe I noticed less hair falling out, but hard to know after such a short period of time. Quality seemed good, but just can‚Äôt justify spending this much money on hair vitamins, so went with another brand with similar reviews, at a cheaper price. That being said, I would have loved to keep taking them if the price was right for me. Didn‚Äôt cause any stomach upset, which I believe is important for some potential customers. I took them each night before bed and never felt queasy or nauseous.

name: Brandy
title: Taste good
content: Since i just started taking these about 5 days ago other than that they taste good, its a fun chance of pace when it comes to taking my vitamins. You dont have to worry about eatting anything before or affter taking these vitamins they wont make your tummy hurt at least they dont hurt mine. Everyones different.. They are totally worth a try.

name: MomMD
title: Waiting to see if they work... they are yummy though
content: I didn't give this product five stars as I have only been taking it a week and therefore it is too soon to say whether or not they are going to improve my hair. I will say that these are THE yummiest vitamins I have ever eaten. They have no subtle aftertaste of vitamins that you sometimes get with chewables or gummies. The consistency is also slightly softer than gummies which I like. They are indeed expensive but if they do their job I'm willing to pay that. I plan on continuing them for at least three months. If my hair growth improves, I will come back and change my review to 5 stars. I really do hope they work!

name: Amazon Customer
title: I have noticed that my hair is growing faster than usual which is great because I recently had it cut (which was a ...
content: I started taking SugarBearHair vitamins almost 1 month ago. I bought them because my hair was falling out a lot (probably due to stress) and also hoping that they would strengthen my nails (I used to get artificial nails for years and years). I really haven't noticed my hair becoming any fuller or my nails getting stronger. I have noticed that my hair is growing faster than usual which is great because I recently had it cut (which was a poor decision ;) ). I'm about to purchase my second bottle, even though they are much more expensive than prenatal vitamins that essentially contain the same ingredients. The taste is great also. After the second bottle if I see no change in hair amount or nail strengthening I plan to discontinue.

name: taylor
title: Definitely hair growth
content: So I have really thin, slow growing hair and recently my hair was falling out in huge clumps in the shower and even when it was dry. I was reluctant to try these because of the price but was desperate and I‚Äôm actually glad I did. My hair doesn‚Äôt grow very fast but I‚Äôve been taking these for around three months and have seen a difference. I haven‚Äôt really noticed a difference as far as strength or thickness but definitely a difference with growth and I believe my hair has started to fall out less. They taste amazing and I will continue to use to see how long my hair can get.

name: Kayla Johnson
title: Great vitamins
content: Just started using this product so can‚Äôt post results yet but the flavor of them are great and I have seen other people‚Äôs testimonies and they have worked amazing for them.. I love the brush!

name: Jean G.

content: My hair has been thinning for 20+ years due to Lupus. I've tried numerous vitamins, shampoos, growth products, but nothing has been very successful. After reading about Sugarbearhair in online posts and articles, I am hopeful, that with all the vitamins and nutrients they contain, they will live up to their hype. We shall see...

name: Nichole C

I have tried and tried to no avail to grow it back and thanks to this product I FINALLY (almost!) succeeded. I wish it cheaper but.. it works :)

name: vickie howell
title: If it‚Äôs worth the money and if it work
content: I just read it‚Äôs not a good hair vitamin so I‚Äôm second guessing my self about reordering it !

name: Mary Cassano
title: Breaking out? Eat less bears!
content: RESPONSE TO PEOPLE WHO BREAK OUT! I too break out from this product HOWEVER I break out from all products containing Biotin.. I just eat half a bear a day. Thats still 1250 mcg ( I believe) of Biotin which is a lot ! Of course if you have sensitive skin and start taking 5000 mcg of biotin you will break out. I just take half a bear and if I see my skin looking a little less clear I skip a day or two and dont have any bears that day. If you have slow going hair, take biotin of some sort, you just need to monitor the amount you take. I been taking biotin for years now. I always will.

name: AKP

content: These taste great. The people who said they broke out when they took it were clearly not drinking enough water. When you take biotin you need to drink lots of water.. I‚Äôve only been taking these for a little over a month so I will be able to give a better review by the end of my second bottle and I will update!

My face only broke out the first week, it's a lot of biotin. Haven't broken out since.

name: Mr. Grey

name: jennpware

name: Amazon Customer

name: Amazon Customer

name: Cassie M Cowell

name: Karina Hernandez

name: Ketoinchi
title: They are delicious and great - if you are REALISTIC!
content: After reading all of the reviews I felt the need to leave my own in order to clarify a few things. I ordered a 3 month supply and just started my second month on SugarBearHair. I think the mistake that a lot of people make is that they expect a MIRACLE vitamin. Unfortunately, hair does not grow inches overnight (or even in a few weeks for that matter). In a nutshell, this company takes all of the good, hair beneficial vitamins and puts them in delicious, easy-to-eat gummies. Can you go to the store and purchase the ingredients (Biotin, etc.) separately for cheaper? Definitely. But these are about having all of the healthy hair benefits in ONE bottle without the nasty taste that other vitamins/supplements have. I have struggled with consistent substantial shedding for awhile now so I wanted to give these a try. I hate swallowing pills- especially the ones that have a bad taste, so these seemed right for me. So far I have NOT noticed a big difference...maybe some baby hairs growing near my temples, but they ARE convenient, delicious and very easy to take. As for the acne topic...I did break out a tiny bit when I first started taking these but I honestly don't know if it was from the sudden influx of Biotin or an external source. I don't have sensitive skin but I guess it's a risk you take if you do. Mine cleared up very quickly. I will update my review after I finish my 3 month supply.

name: Miranda Garrett
title: Idk yet
content: I just started this it says no side effects but it makes me feel dizzy and sick to my stomach for hours after taking it idk what I‚Äôm doing wrong I‚Äôm going to try eating before taking them

name: Kelly Martin
title: Still hope...
content: I originally bought this product with a one month supply because I read these reviews about people breaking g out after taking it and I was nervous to try it. As someone who has struggled with cystic acne for most of my late 20s, I wasnt about to spend money on a three month supply that messed up my finally (somewhat) managed skin. Now that I've been taking it twice a day as the bottle suggests, I can honestly say it has not caused any breakouts. I'm not trying to say that some of these reviews are lies but I've seriously struggled with acne and this has not done anything to make my skin worse, or better for that matter.. So if you're like me and you're worried about some of these reviews with break outs then do what I did and just get one month first to make sure it doesnt affect you first.... However, I can't say I notice a huge change in hairless yet or new hair growth but I'll give it more time. I am ordering month two-five.

name: E Lovin
title: This product caused horrific acne.
content: Before purchasing Sugar Bear Hair, I read reviews about it causing breakouts. I really hoped I wouldn‚Äôt be one of those cases and that it would work for me. After 3 days I began to notice some acne. I tried to stick it out for a whole week and now I am 11 days into taking the recommended dose of 2 a day and my face is badly broken out. It‚Äôs painful and some of the acne is deep and huge! Not just small pimples but the kind that are huge and deep in the skin. I haven‚Äôt ever had bad acne. I‚Äôd get a zit every now and then through out the years but nothing like this. I should have taken 1 a day to start with. I may wait until my acne clears and then do 1 a day.

name: Amazon Customer
title: One month down, and very hopeful about month 2!
content: I'm giving this product 4 stars solely because I've only been using it for a month and am hesitant to give it 5 stars immediately. The photo on the left is from day 1 of the vitamins (April 2016), and the right photo is from the day after my last vitamin (May 2016). I did not track my hair growth religiously each week, but the before and after pictures seem to show a difference. I can see some root grow out (probably over a half an inch), and my hair ends seem to be longer smoother. I've also been using a coconut oil leave in conditioner once or twice a week. Coming from someone who used to have hair way past my shoulders, it's so devestating to have such slow hair growth now after color damage and some health issues. I just ordered month 2 and will do another review after taking it!

name: Or
title: I like the taste
content: I am updating my review to let you know that I am using SugarBear and have used it for one month. I am giving it one more star as I like it so far. I am taking Twinlab daily one multivitamin as well. My hair was already growing so I will return to let you know in August how it is working for me.. __________________________. I haven't tried it but from looking at the research, "The product is comprised of sugar and syrup-based gummies, which lessens the impact of the product by equating it to candy. Glucose, pectin, citric acid, sodium citrate, blue color #1, and wax are not exactly conducive to a 100% healthy hair growth-supporting vitamin blend. It also contains titanium dioxide, a terrible filler." This is by smarter-reviews.com.

name: ai
title: my hair has grown a good 3 1/2 inches in a month
content: I ordered directly from the site and they worked well for me. My hair naturally grows a lot faster than others but I recently chopped off a lot due to damage and I wanted to speed up the growth. I saw a lot of people raving about this and so I decided to try it out. It's helped a lot; my hair has grown a good 3 1/2 inches in a month.. I'm not going to say this is going to work for everyone who is willing to try it because it won't. It's going to make some people break out and some won't even notice a difference in hair growth, and some will. It depends on your body and well, this product isn't for everyone.

title: SugarBear Hair is complex and contains all the vitamins needed for optimum health. No need to supplement  with other vitamins!
content: I am am 64 and as you may know womens hair thins out as we age. SugarBearHair vitamins have done much to stop this process. Also my hair is growing longer! and is really shiny. This is the first time ever that I‚Äôve taken a multivitamin EVERY day and for over a year now. My doctor looked at it and said that I don‚Äôt need to take any other vitamins with this product.The only reason I didn‚Äôt give it 5 stars is because of the sugar content and my tongue looks blue for a while after I take it. title: Great product, but quality control needs work!
content: This is my 3rd bottle of these gummies and they have done wonders for helping to strengthen and grow out my hair which was in an awful state due to years to bleaching, heat damage and i had a lot of it falling out following dramatic weight loss. It‚Äôs now growing out nicely, feels very strong and I‚Äôm seeing less hair coming out when I brush it, so it‚Äôs definitely helping to strengthen it! My only concern is there‚Äôs not a lot of consistency with quality control - my first two bottles were the usual bright blue gummies which were soft and squishy, but my most recent bottle was an odd green colour and they are really hard. Not sure if I was sent a dodgy batch, but the date on the base of the bottle says they are still in date, so I will give them the benefit of the doubt and assume they will still be fine and work the same as the usual blue ones.

name: Natashiie
title: Not to shabby!!
content: Having read a lot of reviews and seen a lot of videos I decided to try these out and said I wouldn't leave a review until I finished my first bottle.. I don't feel like my hair grew any quicker personally, but my hair is curly so it's hard to tell without straightening it! I did do a before and after pic and saw it grew just over an inch but that's pretty standard for my hair.... HOWEVER skin... my skin has been absolutely immaculate since I've been on these. Being half Mediterranean I suffer bad skin and just break outs (magnified on my period) but the whole month I've been in these my skin has been unbelievably calm!! My nails have also gotten stronger too which is really nice as they're normally quite brittle!. Overall I would use these again but I am trying a different brand because these are a little on the expensive side. I would get them again as they do taste nice and do seek to work it's just the price if you're going to bulk buy I guess!!

name: BkChanel
title: Not worth the hype. Review is long, but worth the read
content: I‚Äôm a AA with 4A/4B hair texture. I‚Äôve taken hair, skin, and nail vitamins and other vitamins in the past, but I prefer the gummies because they are more convenient to take. I was previously take Nature‚Äôs Bound (check the name ) strawberry, but I didn‚Äôt really see a difference. I searched the internet and these had great reviews. I took these a few months ago in December and purchased some for my sister, she had positive feedback. At that time, I didn‚Äôt really see a difference, but it was only one month. So starting June of this year, I took the vitamins consistently, in fact, I only missed two days of dosage and that was very early on. So, I purchased some for July. Well, lately I‚Äôve been noticing a few things, but the only thing that has changed for me is the vitamin intake.. 1. I pee a lot, I mean a lot. At first I thought it was my increased water intake, but even when I don‚Äôt drink as much or I stop drinking several hours before bed and void my system, I‚Äôm waking up at least one time, sometimes two times a night. I remember hearing about if your body doesn‚Äôt need something it eliminates it, I‚Äôm thinking with the excessive amounts of vitamins (more than likely biotin (see below for why I think why )) my body is eliminating it.. 2. I have box braids in, I‚Äôve had box braids in since I started the vitamins. I do believe my hair has grown a lot, but I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs the vitamins. The reason why, when I have box braids in and I‚Äôm using JBCO and wild growth oil, my hair grows out faster. I‚Äôve also added rice water to the mix and deep condition every two weeks. Again, I can‚Äôt say the vitamins didn‚Äôt help at all, but (see next point ) but consider everything else I‚Äôm doing and results in the past, it‚Äôs hard to believe it‚Äôs from the vitamins.. 3. My nails haven‚Äôt changed, my skin has experience a few minor breakouts. I‚Äôm 30, so the days of teenage acne, thankfully is long gone. However, around my menstrual I still experience hormonal acne and when I‚Äôm stressed. I haven‚Äôt been stressed so much lately and I‚Äôm on a BC that eliminates my periods. Also, usually when I get acne or a few breakouts at this stage, it‚Äôs on my chin, well since taking these vitamins, I‚Äôve had acne on my forehead. Not much, just a bump here and there, which I haven‚Äôt had since I was a teenager, so this is huge for me. Also, my nails are still brittle . I‚Äôve taken Hairfinity years ago and the first thing I noticed was my nails improving. My nails never had an issue growing long, but staying strong, they always are brittle. About two months before taking the vitamins, I decided not to do anything to my nails, just try and file them and keep them healthy. Well, my nails are still brittle . Not saying the vitamins were supposed to change that, but I would have hoped to see some benefits with my hair(which is still up for debate just a tiny bit) , skin, or nails .. 4. This is probably the most important factor, my vitamin levels are still low. I understand that sometimes when you are on these types of vitamins you can have false positive with blood vitamin test and other blood test, but this isn‚Äôt my case. I recently went to the doctor and received a blood panel. I‚Äôve been having some other issues as well as feeling fatigue. Guess what, I have vitamin d deficiency, I‚Äôm not surprised my dad has it, and I avoid the sun like the plague now, I live in Florida. My vitamin D levels are low, I‚Äôm on a regimen for 12 weeks (most people do 6-8 weeks and go to just taking calcium ). Also, I failed to tell my doctor I was taking the hair, skin, and nail vitamins, but after getting these results, and others she told me to take a multi vitamin and take one with iron. I‚Äôm not a doctor, but here are my thoughts , the vitamins contain a daily dosage of vitamin d, I know with a deficiency it‚Äôs possible that the vitamins did help me some in this area and I was just still low. But for her to look at my overall results and still recommend that I take a multi vitamin, is a little alarming. Again, I understand that this is NOT a multi vitamin, but I would have just thought that I would be receiving a sufficient amount of the vitamins stated in the bottle , maybe my body did not simply adjust.. This review is not to bash the vitamins, but just my experience. I‚Äôm going to stop taking them. If nothing changes, I‚Äôll take the review down (meaning I found out my issues were related to something else ). I‚Äôve read tons of positive reviews about the vitamins, so I‚Äôm praying they were all accurate and I‚Äôm a rare case, however I will be reading in my $30 vitamins for some that are half the price that includes iron and less things that I don‚Äôt need. Disclaimer: I know that these are not miracle pills and these things usually only help people who are experiencing a shortage of vitamins from their diet, but I would encourage you that if you have any concern see a doctor and receive accurate info about what vitamins you need. If you can‚Äôt see a doctor, start with an OTC (over the counter ) vitamin that‚Äôs half the cost, look into other things for nail and skin health, and tea and eat healthier

name: Lauren Tyson
title: Must stay consistent with these.
content: So I have been taking these for a year now.. I have noticed a few things.. 1. You have to be consistent with these, i missed a week and could tell a difference. Which is most vitamins anyways... 2. This is the longest my hair has been since I was a teenager and I have cut it 3 times this year to get the old bleached dead ends off. And I cut off 2-3 inches each time.. It is now past my tatas, which was my goal and have never been able to do it without extensions! So very happy about that.. 3. You will notice hair growth everywhere‚Ä¶ and I mean everywhere. I have to shave my legs almost everyday now but I‚Äôll take it if my hair stays long and healthy!!. 4. The only thing that bothers me is the bottle says 60 vitamins and it‚Äôs always one short. My last day of the bottle is always 1 instead of 2. I think for that price it needs to be more on top of the count going in. Unless they are trying to be stingy.. Overall I think it‚Äôs a good start to get your hair healthy and then you can take over from there. Keep your hair trimmed and don‚Äôt expect miracles overnight.

content: This is my first time ordering these. Considering they pride themselves on being the first ‚Äúblue‚Äù hair gummy, they should make sure they are just that‚Ä¶ blue. I had to check the expiration date, which still was within the time it should be‚Ä¶ but for the color change, oxygen had to have gotten to it before sealing the container. Makes you wonder. I am still taking them, let‚Äôs pray I survive lol. I haven‚Äôt been taking them long enough to notice anything.

name: AyaPup
title: Minor breakouts so far. Why is there sugar in this product?
content: I have been taking these for a little over a week. I have already noticed I am not losing as much hair when I brush and wash it. It is making me break out in white heads and small pimples. I also started taking vitamin B5 at the same time. Vitamin B5 helps to stop Biotin from creating acne breakouts. The bears I have been taking twice a day and the B5 once a day so I am going to increase it to twice a day as well to see if that helps control breakouts. I have acne prone skin and I figured that this product would make me break out, but my hair has been growing much slower than usual now that I no longer bleach it (coloring or bleaching the hair can make it grow faster from the scalp as the chemicals help to stop fungal issues and buildup which slows down hair growth), so for me it was worth a shot. I'm not giving up on the bears yet and am going to try a more diligent skin care routine along with increasing my b5 dosage. If the acne gets worse or can't be controlled by changing my routine, I will sadly have to discontinue use.. I get that it is called sugar bear hair, and that sugar is pretty much put in everything these days, but with all of the alternatives out there along with the fact that bitoin can cause breakouts already, having sugar as an ingredient doesn't make a lot of sense. I break out from sugar as well so it would be nice to have a truly healthy gummy and if they included Vitamin b5 as an ingredient to help negate the skin effects of Biotin. I commend them for making a gummy that is free from artificial ingredients at least. I hope the company can consider a healthy sugar free alternative, as a lot of people are unable to tolerate sugar.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Now this is a Instagram famous brand and I'm pretty skeptical of hair pills in general and I've tried ...
content: Okay so I received this product incredibly fast so I'm giving it 5 stars for shipping. Now this is a Instagram famous brand and I'm pretty skeptical of hair pills in general and I've tried a bunch. Now these are pretty damn expensive vitamins. Like compared to other vitamins that contain way more in the bottle and contain way more vitamins and nutrients these are pretty mediocre and overhyped. Now that being said I bought these because if you're on a journey to grow out your hair and have ever tried any brand of hair skin and nails vitamins you know those vitamins are big AF and smell horrible! Sometimes they mess up your tummy too if you eat them without a meal. So that's where I think these gummies win they smell really good ( like Hubba Bubba tape actually) and taste even better like a sweet berry flavor. I personally after buying other brands fall off the wagon when it comes to taking them everyday so the benefits are lost but these are so sweet and fun to take I won't forget. I also should mention buzzfeed did a video on these and got a lab to test them. They received and A grade from the independent lab but they found that if you took more than 2 a day you'd be consuming excessive amounts of lead so keep these away from children because they straight up look like candy. They also found that these contained more biotin then what's on the bottle. Take that for what you will.. I think if you have no problem taking pills everyday then there are cheaper options that contain more vitamins. Hell I think a gummy multivitamin would be the same as this if not better. Really what you're paying for is the novelty and cuteness of the item. If the price is right with you I think these are a great option.. Also a lot of people experience breakouts when taking biotin. If you find yourself breaking out drink more water alongside the supplements and I would only take half of the recommended serving so one bear a day and see if that helps.

name: Jessica B.
title: I wouldn't suggest buying these on Amazon
content: They look and taste good, I will give them that. I was worried about the possibility of a knock off based on past reviews but mine seems to be authentic. HOWEVER, I will not be purchasing these from Amazon ever again. The bottle I received had a manufactured date from 8/2021, so they are almost a whole year old. Amazon does NOT offer return/refund on this product either. So in the future, I will purchase them or anoter kind in the store where I can check the dates because $26 for a year old product that has already begun to lose its potency/effectiveness is not acceptable.

name: Megan M.
title: Be cautious
content: I ordered these because I heard about them and saw influencers promoting them. I noticed a small amount of growth on my hair taking these. I took them everyday for two months. I couldn‚Äôt figure out why I kept breaking out. Then i did some more digging and some other people said once they started taking these vitamins they started getting acne. I stopped taking them after two months. They‚Äôre easy to swallow, taste sugary and sweet but just not for me.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Changed the flavor
content: I‚Äôve been taking these for about a year and I think they work. My hair has grown like crazy, but I also drink collagen everyday too, so it‚Äôs hard to say it‚Äôs just the vitamins. They changed the flavor and they are nasty. I‚Äôve been thinking of being done with them, I guess with the new flavor it‚Äôs time.

name: Esther Kwon
title: Works but does give you acne
content: I have been taking sugar bear hair for almost a year now and I used to really love it. I took 2 a day everyday as suggested by the bottle. They taste great and are easy to chew. I'm asian and I have long black hair and I have been bleaching my hair blonde for a few years now. A year ago I accidently let the bleach sit in my hair too long and experienced some breakage and more damage than usual. I started taking these gummies to help me with my hair and I think they work ok. My hair has been growing out nicely and my nails feel a little stronger too. I thought they were too expensive but I got them anyway because they were delicious and any help for my hair doesn't hurt. I started to notice about 2 months ago that I've started getting a lot of acne on my scalp. I didn't think too much about it but recently wondered if it was due to the gummies. I stopped taking the gummies and suddenly no new acne. I think if you keep taking them for a long time you do start to get acne. I have been subscribed to getting a bottle a month and have no canceled it. I have a bottle and a half left over and I will probably take one gummy once in a while until it's gone. But honestly I don't think you need it but if you have the money go for it but maybe take 1 every few days and not everyday.

I know this is about hair, but I always know how long my hair is growing by how long my nails are. Olly had my toenails looking like dinosaur toes! Lol

I will be giving amazon another opportunity to send me an authentic bottle of vitamins, I just advise everyone to look at the packaging thoroughly before taking them.

No es apto para todas las personas, hay quienes no tienen este problema pero no pens√© que lo fuera a tener yo, jam√°s en la vida tuve un grano y ahora tengo much√≠simo acn√©. name: Jessica
title: Nice but causes acne for me
content: So I bought these gummies and I tried them out for like 3 and 1/2 weeks. So far I saw that it did stop my hair from falling out more. It helped Woth my nails alotttt more than my hair. I was so excited because I‚Äôm Muslim and these were the only gummies I could find that were halal and then that‚Äôs when it hit me! I started getting acne with this and tbh at first I ignored it thinking maybe it‚Äôs just hormonal acne acting up but then I started seeing a new pimple every single day. title: Candy

name: Kitt
title: 50/50 guess what half i am?
content: I have been using sugar bear hair gummies for over 2 years now. my hair on my head, eyebrows and eyelashes have grown beautifully and my nails are strong and long which has never happened before so that won me over. I have been dealing with strange breakouts on my chin and cheeks and I never thought much about it, I thought maybe it was my birth control. turns out I'm having a reaction to something in the gummies. After reading a lot of the reviews it looks like I'm not the only one and we're all breaking out in the same place. It's a 50-50 chance that this is going to affect your skin. You won't know till you take it for at least two months. Don't let the bad reviews turn you away from trying them. The vitamins taste great and they do work you just have to give it about 6 months to see if any results with your hair or nails. I'm not ready to fully give up when sugar bear because I have seen tremendous results. My hair went from my shoulders down past my waist in two years. My nails are long and strong my eyelashes go for miles. They just released their multivitamin for women I'm going to switch and see if that helps with the acne. I should know after 2 months if it doesn't help I'm going to have to stop taking sugarbear vitamins all together. I've never had acne before, my skin has always been perfect. I'll update my review after 2 months of switching to the Women's Multivitamin.

name: noranb
title: Starting the SugarBear Hair Journey
content: The first thing I have to mention is that I have only been taking these vitamins for 3 weeks but I thought I would say a few things about them now and update my status as time goes on.. 1. Before starting SugarBear Hair, I sent the ingredients to my doctor since I was already taking 2 supplements and a multi-vitamin. I was told to stop the multi-vitamin.. 2. They don't smell very good when you take a whiff of them after breaking the seal. Don't let that discourage you.. 3. They are yummy. They taste really good but the texture is not like a candy gummy bear. It is a little chewier and sticks a little to my teeth as I chew it... but still good.. Sept 24 _ I am now one week into my third bottle of Sugar Bear Hair Vitamins. I have noticed the following:. 1. I am not losing as much hair when I wash my hair or comb it. My hair used to cover the shower drain when I would rinse my hair... no more.. 2. I do not have hair growing on my face as others have claimed.. 3. I have always been able to grown long nails but now they are growing a little faster and stronger.. 4. Since I have curly hair and I also trimmed my hair 3 weeks into taking Sugar Bear, I cannot tell if my hair is growing faster but I did notice that I had to color my hair (I have lots of gray) in four weeks instead of 5.

name: Sarah Nellessen
title: Not really noticing a difference tbh
content: I‚Äôve been using these for a couple months now, along with some other hair growth methods and I‚Äôm not noticing a difference tbh. Maybe not worth all the hype. But I‚Äôm still going to keep trying since it‚Äôs only been a couple months

I decided to take the chance‚ÄîI‚Äôve never had acne and feel I‚Äôm pretty ‚Äúprone‚Äù (which a lot of others said too). Unfortunately I was wrong...my skin got HORRIBLE. I usually get a pimple here and there and it‚Äôs tiny. I had huge, painful acne and a ton of tiny red pimple everywhere. I do think my hair was growing a little faster but the good did not outweigh the bad for me.

name: Shop Diva
title: Be sure to count the gummy's when you open the bottle, might be missing a couple.
content: This is easy to take every day and it is quite tasty. I was having a LOT of hair loss. Taking this along with an iron supplement and some diet changes have definitely helped. This is my third bottle. The first time I ended up with one gummy left over, which seemed odd but I thought maybe I just didnt take two on one day or lost a gummy. But it happened again with the second bottle and I was extra diligent to ensure I took two and that I did not leave the cap off. When I received the 3rd bottle, I counted the gummy's when I opened the bottle. It was 3 gummy's short. There is no sure way to say how short the other bottles were but if I order again, I will count the gummy's first thing. I am willing to bet all the bottles I received were short and not over in the number of gummy's they contained.

name: michele moede
title: Wouldn't buy again
content: Does not taste that great

name: katie langley
title: Good, but causes acne.
content: About a month ago, I decided to try to fix my very damaged hair, which I have been straightening most days for 5 or so years. The first few weeks I used this product as directed (2/day) I experienced severe body acne unlike I‚Äôve ever had, so I gave it a break and stopped taking them for a while. Recently, I have switched to taking 1 gummy per day instead of 2, and I‚Äôve observed only a little impact on my skin. Now, my hair is 100x healthier than it was- a result of taking sugar bear, swearing off heat tools and t-shirt drying. I definitely do believe sugar bear made a difference because my hair is a lot shinier, softer and seems to be growing. It is less brittle and I am noticing less breakage. I am pretty much happy with sugar bear but I would be cautious if you have acne-prone skin.

name: AM
title: See review
content: 1.) I would give these a full five stars for their flavor. Actually wish these could be bought as just a candy, the flavor is that good.. 2.) After buying four bottles worth and trying it over the course of several months, I unequivocally believe it is a waste of money. We did not notice enough difference in our hair and thought you could do just as well with a simple, much cheaper B complex vitamin.. 3.) From what I can tell they are pretty overpriced. I don‚Äôt know if the cost = paying for a brand, concept, treat or what. But it‚Äôs absolute nonsense to pay that much money for a vitamin gummy with limited results. My nails did grow stronger, but no mare than with a multivitamin.. Based on some of the reviews on Amazon and the other search modalities, I fully anticipated them being considerably more effective.. 4.) Save yourself a lot of money, and buy a prenatal vitamin if you want your hair and nails to grow better.

name: Atheer
title: I don‚Äôt know if it worked
content: Honestly I don‚Äôt know if it worked I didn‚Äôt use it long enough but I didn‚Äôt find it necessary.  it tastes amazing and I guess if you are low in certain vitamins it can help but if you‚Äôre perfectly healthy I don‚Äôt know if it will show significant difference.

name: Dalton blake smitherman
title: Opened package‚Ä¶
content: Very upset because I received the bottle and the seal was already opened almost all the way. The bottle says to discard if seal is broken.

name: Ale Feragui
title: It's okay
content: Used for two months; My hair grew obviously, but mainly because of the vitamins, time and not because I overdosed on Biotin. You're just flushing the excess down the toilet.. I continued using them because they were a gift and a little extra vitamins is always welcome, but I wouldn't buy them off my own salary.. Don't like the fact that it has titanium dioxide (we really don't need the blue coloring in our system), nor glucose syrup.. Citric acid and sodium citrate are actually used to treat kidney stones, or alkalize urine, but you should drink water after chewing on these vitamins. Mostly to take them off your teeth, but actually because intuitively I feel you need water to take this combination of sodiums and salts.. I actually paid 20 bucks for an all natural all around multi vitamin with the right amount of biotin for use; It's called Garden Of Life Vitamins, they have a good range of products and the manufacturing process is all natural including probiotics. No magnesium stereate or other preservatives or fillings.

name: Alma
title: Trying new product
content: Hi, I ordered this product because I have very thin hair and my hair falls easily. This product was recommended by a coworker. I received it on May 30th and it has been a week of taking the product. I know it's early to see any results but I will come back when I'm done with the product to continue giving my update on it. Flavor wise, it is very sweet for me but maybe others may like the sweetness of it.

name: desiree
title: Taste good but didn't work for me
content: Taste is great but didn't work for what I needed it for. I bought these because I was losing so much hair after giving birth and thought these would work but unfortunately it didn't, I was still losing a lot of hair so I started taking one a day multivitamin gummies and one a day prenatal gummies and that seem to work a little better than these. These may work for hair growth and shine maybe but I can't say because I have a natural shine and my hair grows fast anyway.

name: mohammad bonakdar
title: Okay
content: I like this

name: Prasanth Annam
